lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello, everyone, and welcome to tonight's episode of Critical Role, where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors sit around and play Dungeons and Dragons.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's what we do!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep! So, welcome. We had a brief break last week as Liam brought us through his delightfully dark and twisted mind. Thank you again, Liam, for running that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Creepy!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I went to Catholic school!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was awesome.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why am I not surprised?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, anyway, glad you could join us. Before we jump into tonight's game, we have some quick announcements to make. First and foremost, you want to talk about some new merch stuff that just got in there? What the hell you've got right there?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's that?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What are these?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What are these? These shirts are in the store right now! And the color, and they're so soft, I'll be petting you guys throughout the whole night.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're soft like the hoodie. They're like a thin version of the soft hoodie.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If you have the Gilmore shirt, it feels like the Gilmore shirt. Also, the Critical Role dice are coming back in stock very soon, but they are on preorder right now in the store. You can go in and get on that. We also have the CR enamel pin back in stock, so you can check that shit out in the store right now. We'll wait.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Awesome. Let's see. There's a new Signal Boost coming out this week with kind of a cool person who hosted that. Who's that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: DM O'Drien!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am not cool, so you are not talking about me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's actually going to play during the break.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh yeah?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So you can hear about all my artsy-fartsy theatrical sad hangups from the past? Oh joy, guys!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, yeah! You'll like it! So stick around!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: MomoCon!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, MomoCon is just fun to say. MomoCon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're all going to say it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. So we'll be there, it'll be fun. It's May 25th to the 28th, in Atlanta, Georgia. Look forward to seeing you guys there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh my gosh, oh my gosh!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my, what? How? Why? (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's the start of a new year.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why doesn't it wrap around to the back?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I tried to get the eyes on my nipples.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pull it down a little bit. Just give it a little tug. There it is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've never realized how large-- Wow, it's bulging. Those are some bulging eye sausages if I've ever seen them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's great is when you're not stretching it, it looks like that dumb FaceApp thing now where you can see your older version of yourself.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Have you noticed, the guys turn into girls so much better than the girls turn into guys? I mean, we look so terrible turning into--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I've seen some girl photos that turned out pretty good. Maybe it's just you guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You have to have your hair pulled back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It might just be the three of you, I'm sorry. Although who did Ashley end up looking like?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Haley Joel Osment.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that worked out pretty well.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Actually, a lot of people tell me that I look like him anyway.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Him or-- I get--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Brad Pitt?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, definitely Brad Pitt.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: From the '80s band, it's a guy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Keep going.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Justin George?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Narrowed it down. Hum a melody.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I can't think of a song. I'll think of it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is the whole episode.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And she'll just yell it out during the break. Travis makes a really ugly woman, though. I turned one of your pictures into a girl. I never should have done that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't agree with that. I've seen Nip Tuck.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you, Matt! Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A supportive significant other. Wednesday Club, Taliesin! Do you want to talk about Wednesday Club?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Actually, this one, it's going to be Matt Key is taking the reins on this one, so I don't even-- I'm not sure he's settled on what's going on, but I think we were talking about maybe Brian K. Vaughan and looking at his whole body of work, which would be a lot of fun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go, that'll be fun.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: TV writer and comic book writer. Could be cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fantastic. And of course we have Talks Machina next Tuesday, live here on Twitch and Alpha at 7PM Pacific with our wonderful host, Brian Wayne Foster.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Except there won't be one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh wait, there won't be one this week! Never mind, 'cause they're going to be on vacation.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They're going to-- Where are you going, the North Pole?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I wish we were going to the North Pole. We are going to Mexico!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let's be nice and vague. Going to a place that's pretty.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We're going to a place.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which, as a note, as far as Brian was saying, you guys really haven't had a vacation together, ever.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Never.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, super excited that you guys have the chance to do that.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We've almost been dating for five years and we've never gone on a vacation together.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Y'all are dating? (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait. What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, that'll be fun. Yeah!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Also, your Date with Matt Mercer in a Silk Robe, thanks to Brian Wayne Foster, will be up on YouTube tomorrow at 10AM.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ho boy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is that okay?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's fine. Prepare for a lot of port drinking.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Boy George! Boy George! I get it a lot. I get that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What? You don't look like-- With a lot of makeup, maybe?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Awesome, so tomorrow? All right, for those of you guys who missed it, you'll be able to see it tomorrow. No, that's fine, bring tissues.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That could go a number of ways.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That it can.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But no, thank you all. Thank you all who came on Tuesday to chat and talk and create some fun future characters for this storyline in the future, it'll be fun. Anyway, do we have anything else anyone wants to mention, or shall we continue?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you already do the shirts?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is so nightmarish, Sam.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I love it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's an homage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It looks like Mercer's eating the table.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What I'm looking forward to is the eventuality that you have enough of these shirts that your closet has a section that's just my face.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Your face, my face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's just this face is printed, and just having your wife eventually come up to me and having you go--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let me think on that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And welcome back, everyone. So, last we left off, Vox Machina, having completed a multitude of various quests over a prolonged period of time, found themselves free of immediate necessity and danger.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Brought peace to the world forever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, that's not true.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nothing bad will ever happen again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Credits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, as the last episode wound down and friendships were strengthened, you all then began to ponder about what you wanted to do with the time before you. And today we return approximately one year after we left off. So, we met earlier this week to discuss this. We went through a various number of things you wanted to accomplish, both as individuals and some of you in groups. So we're going to go ahead and go over those elements for you guys and get everyone up to speed with what exactly has transpired in this year period of time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Show and tell!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, who would like to begin?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're just going to share?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just say what we did, what we accomplished?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Summer vacation!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Share elements of it, and then some elements will be roleplayed, because that's what I want to do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because that's what I want to do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. So.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you pointing at me? Okay, okay. I'll start.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so, Grog, what are some of the things you did?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Because I single-handedly established peace across Exandria, I found myself bored, in need of action. And so I sought out where the fight would now be. I looked for Scanlan a little bit along the way. I didn't find him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you did not.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I think before I left, I wanted to get some personal things, like, done to my body. So I had the bear tattoo that I filleted of off Kevdak, and I had it tanned, and then I got a copy of that tattoo on my back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Because that shit's behind me.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you now have Kevdak's bear-totem tattoo that was on his chest, now on your back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Out of sheer disrespect for him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Totes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I love it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did you get a bear ass on your bare ass?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Much better idea. I also took Kevdak's skull, the top of it, and I had a new cup, a new mug made out of it. With metal bits and stuff, with a handle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, yeah. Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't understand how, but it looks really great. It's like metal and bone, and I (drinking sounds). That's me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's delicious.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I just choked on a peanut.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Oh Grog. I heard it happen.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So, I went to Vasselheim, and I defended my title in the Crucible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Met multiple times.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Multiple times.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Including once against a familiar individual called Kern the Hammer.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Kern the Hammer, he came back with that monk shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. And did not prevail.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, he did come back to you, requesting to learn and train under you, to teach him your ways. To which you said--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I forgot. No. Yes. I said yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You said no.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's what you told me, at least.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I said no. I said no, because I was like, you've got to drink, all the time, and this, and he just wasn't up to snuff. That, and I should not be teaching anyone anything. So then I went to the Slayer's Take, right, in search of big game. And I had fun with that for a while, but it just wasn't quite the same. It wasn't crazy-ass, you know, ancient dragons or nothing. It just wasn't quite up to snuff. But I did have my curiosity about the Deck of Many Things piqued. So, at some point along the way, Vex's warnings ringing in my ears, I found a nice drunk sap to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, so, as you are wandering down an evening byway in the Quadroads of Vasselheim, a number of cups in yourself, you hiccup loudly and glance off to the side to find one gentleman who's been far deeper in his cups and is currently trying to steady himself against the stone wall in an alleyway.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yup. Hey, you!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You. You look like a mighty warrior. Do you need another drink?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, if you're buying, yeah."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I do. I have one. And I pour him a little bit from the keg. Hey, do you have like, a wife, kids, attachments? Anyone that would miss you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You think if I did I'd be drinking this hard?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to take that as a no. Cool, hey, look, I don't know if you're interested, but I have, in my possession, something really cool. And I take out the Deck. Do you know what this is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have no idea."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Great! Great! We're in the street, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You're near a thoroughfare and there's a small alley off to the side.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Good. Follow me into this alley and it'll be a deal. Just follow me over here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check. With advantage, because he's really drunk.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: For anyone who's watching, this is like, abduction, how to not-- 101, self-defense.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is terrible.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, he's either changing this guy's life for the better, or murdering him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 19 plus one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) You watch as in the center of his pupils a little sparkle of interest kicks in. And, I mean, five percent soberer at the prospect of something fun of this stranger that gave him a drink and goes: "Wait, what are you talking about?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, listen. I am kind of like an evangelical spreader of good news. And I found this. And one time I pulled a card out and I got a magic weapon. It was amazing. And I just figured, like, you look like a guy that would appreciate such a weapon, so--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (belches)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: -- and I open the Deck. I thought maybe you would like to draw a card.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He takes a second and looks around. Looks at the Deck. "Is this some sort of a magic trick?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes. Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. Do you want me to tell you what it is?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure. Yeah. Just draw it and-- Actually, just hold it and don't tell me what it is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Let me get my cards out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my God.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You have an actual set?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What the actual fuck is happening right now?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It probably happened in the first week.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is the first of ten guys.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Lot of problems, lot of drinking, lot of fighting. Ran out of shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What if you die? What if you die right now?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm not. He's drawing the card.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but you could still die.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It could kill-- It could kill you too.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Could it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think so.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm not really sure on how this shit works. But I need another card to come out of that Deck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, maybe.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my God. Oh no, what did he pull. What did he pull?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. No. No. Huh. I'm going to let somebody else pull this. Who wants to pull it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, you raise your hand to pull from the Deck? Thats some bullshit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no. Should I turn it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ooh. Ooh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you know what that is?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I don't remember.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's just, it looked ominous.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It was a face card, though.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It was a face card. Oh. Oh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no. Is it amazing? Did he get something really good?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're the DM now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) He takes the card and looks at it. Turns around and shows you, and it's this tarot card of a beautiful moonscape, with an open night sky. I believe that's what it is. Yeah, that's what it is. He puts it back in the Deck, and is like: "All "right, what's the trick? I'm-- I'm feeling a little-- a little strange."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Could you describe to me how you feel right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I wish that I was a powerful lord of the Quadroads." And there's a strange, tingling visual image as the cloth around him that was tattered and worn-out becomes beautiful silks--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my God.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The drunkenness fades from him ever-so-slightly, and now he looks washed. And you glance over at the far end of the alleyway, and there's a guy there who's dressed in long, long tails and a coat and goes: "Sir, how long are you going to be?" He goes: "Right with you. I don't even know what his name is. Well, thank you so much, stranger." And he pats you on the shoulder.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Grog. Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Grog."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Grog Strongjaw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Grog Strongthings."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maker of kings.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Great."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yup.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I still got one more of these." And he walks off and runs off to the carriage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He got two wishes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 1d3 wishes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you fucking serious?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, he got two wishes? You gave away two wishes?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (shouts) Wait! What was your name?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The queen of diamonds was the card.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did I get his name?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You didn't get his name. He just runs off.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Lord of the Quadroads, now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You just got a cure for cancer, and you gave it away?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, wait, I have a question. Once a card has been pulled, is it gone from the Deck, or does it go back in?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Some go back, and some--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my God.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, obviously, it was just a little appetizer, the first one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, let me see here. Let me see. Let me see.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is way better.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughs) You want to pull another one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Matt's verifying.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Verifying that he did the right thing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's double-checking.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is important.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know. Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Once the card is drawn, it fades from existence.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh there's no other-- No, the Wish card goes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The best card is fucking gone. It is the best card, isn't it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Now the Deck is slightly shittier.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Way shittier!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you know what?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know what? Only one person picked that card from the Deck. So it's not really my fault.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's Laura's fault?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Good roll, Laura.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you, thank you. Hey, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That one's gone, now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Lord of the Quadroads now owes you a favor.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's true!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It was the queen of diamonds, right? Yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I say, at the end of all this, we all pick one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who was that man? That was Taliesin Jaffe, Mayor of Ren Faire!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Huzzah!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Huzzah!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's going on, Matt?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just double-checking to make sure the card goes away, and it does, according to how it's written.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This Deck is a mighty gift!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're doomed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I put it back in the Bag of Holding.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. I was like, "Oh god, is he going to draw another card?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Two-hour combat scenario.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I want to, really bad, but I have an open bar tab.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay then! You, in your time away, radically changed some poor man's life! And, apparently, Wished himself to some level of nobility within the Quadroads of Vasselheim, with one Wish still standing!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's amazing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Remember that guy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Lord of the Crossroads? Quadroads?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, there are many lords and ladies of the Quadroads, he's just now one of them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Good deal. That happened.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I was thinking to myself it was either going to be that or some grim reaper's going to show up and cut his head off.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's all I wanted, really. Just cheer him on, maybe have a little better counterweight for my expectation of the Deck, but now I just want to pull one every day. Nothing but good shit happens! Magic weapon! Fucking Wishes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So if this happened early in your year, do you still resist the urge as the year progresses?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, Jesus!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yay!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How long does it take until the urge creeps up again?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, oh god, why do I have to be so fucking true to my character?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's nothing we can do!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're not even there!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Probably thinks he has three birthdays a year, right? So.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Because she'll understand that this is an awesome deck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which actually plays into her opening. The other thing you did, which happens towards the end of the year, is you said you went to the Frostweald.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I did, yeah. I was curious about the werewolves. So I went to go see the nymph in the frozen lake. You know, the one that's all about Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mm-hm.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So I had a conversation with her, and I felt really bad because I wasn't as affectionate as last time, so I gave her this palm-sized ruby that was at the bottom of the bag. Looked really pretty, so I gave it to her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She thanked you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Turns out--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Lycanthropy is scattered throughout the planes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, I didn't fucking know that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now you do. She passed that information on to you. All right. So. That's the truncated example of Grog's year. We might come back to it here in a minute. Next up would be Pike, because that's a good transition point there. So, what'd you do?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All right. So I followed, in the beginning-- did the guy pick the Deck in Vasselheim? Or were you--

lines.name: MATT, TRAVIS
lines.text: It was in Vasselheim.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So I went with Grog to Vasselheim. And because I wanted to go and read and work on some things--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Check in on your temple that you built there.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes. I ended up fighting (laughs) because I saw him fight, and I was like, oh, I should probably just try it!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And did well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm the second champion under Grog.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And as everyone was pitting both of you against each other for another championship bout, you both decided to--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do it. No! To fight!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: To kill each other.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We didn't end up doing it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We just shook--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Too true!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: -- and I would win. So we just decided not to do it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Two monsters of a feather stay in leather.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Two monsters of a feather. Also, in that time, which was a five-month period, we had a lot of lessons and taught Grog how to read.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yay!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Just a little bit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just a little.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can slowly read four- to five-letter words.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Five-letter words is a big deal!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a big fucking deal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He knows how to write his name now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And he can write a full sentence over a short rest.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Meat. Cat.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Farts. Farts.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Doody, with a Y.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does he get exhausted from reading?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, what did you ask?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If he gets mentally exhausted from reading. Takes a point of exhaustion when he tries to read.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm so tired!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm tired now!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I took some time to learn how to be just a little bit more stealthy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Just did a little bit of training. Not a ton, but maybe, we'll see. I also went to check on great-great-grandpappy Wilhand to see how he was doing, and he's doing fine. He's older.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wilhand. Yeah, he's doing good. The home that was damaged in the Umbrasyl attack on Westruun, your room has been repaired. Though it's taken a little while, because it's mainly just him hiring who he can at the time. But he's doing well. He's "an old gnome, but still kicking "around! Still doing his best, still doing his prayers to Sarenrae, "glad to see you coming, saying hi."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, of course. Always.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does he still have Fassbender?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I've totally forgot about Fassbender! Didn't he die?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, no, no, we left Fassbender with him.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh shit, I forgot about Fassbender.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I thought that we lost him in the dragon fight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, no, no, we left him with Wilhand.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He's keeping him safe. He probably helped build the house.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you ask him about that, ask him where Fassbender is, he's like, "Oh, this nice older "fella came by and said it was his property? So I gave it back to him. He seemed very--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It was that dick.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "-- very intent on receiving his property, and I wasn't about to argue."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He was technically his.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It was technically his. I also sent a little bit of money to -- I don't know where they are, but I hired somebody to send a letter and some money to some of my family.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, some of the Trickfoots.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah. And what else? Oh, last, but certainly not least, we opened up a bakery.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, yeah!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes we did!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's it called?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's called-- tell 'em.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's called-- well, this was Tary's idea-- it's called the Slayer's Cake.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And we have many, many items.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Delicious Sun Treats.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Sun Treats. Bear Claws. Angel Food Cake.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Some Tree Bark that Keyleth made.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So many treats and treasures.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bear Claws?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Definitely Bear Claws, yeah. Out of Whitestone, of course.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Obviously, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Bear Claws? Is that it? Did you guys make Bear Claws?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So Tary, Keyleth, Vex and I just decided on a drunken evening, we were like, we should open up a bakery!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We found this building that was pretty abandoned in Whitestone, we fuckin' put in a bakery.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We should just do this tomorrow. We should do it tomorrow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Whitestone needs more commerce.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's right.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It does.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And there are plenty of vacant buildings that are starting to fill up as people move back in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's why we did it, 'cause we wanted to help the economy.

lines.name: MARISHA, ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Anything to get you out of the wine cellar is such a good idea.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Plus, small-business tax breaks, it was good all the way around.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're not getting a tax break.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I did try looking for Scanlan at one point.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You did, yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: But I couldn't find him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. It led you all the way to Emon, I think it was, then it went cold. Yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, we went to go see--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll get to that.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: -- something great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, we'll get to that.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah. So that's what I did on my year of break.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, who wants to go next?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we going in order, or-- what are we doing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, I guess we can, yeah. All right, well, I spent my beginning of the year trying to find the baby of the Grey Render that I sent on its way. Mortally.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you discovered that there was an offspring. There was a singular offspring in the Parchwood, not too far from where you saw it emerge in your vision. And upon finally finding it, it was young and defensive and feral and, after--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Very angry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Very angry. And day after day you returned with various foods and meat and trying to connect with it, and did not succeed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I did not. I failed miserably.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So many shit rolls.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So many shit rolls!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. It fled southward into the Parchwood, and while you now have sent your Grey Hunt that is now working below you to keep an eye out for it, it has not been seen since.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. I am on the lookout in case it comes close to our territory. I want to keep our people safe. But I'm not going to go and try to kill it just for the shits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. I also built my house!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mm-hm.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, and Tary, Tary moved in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I didn't have a place to stay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I have such a large house, you might as well just come and live over here, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I mean, if you'll have me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course, darling!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can sleep on a couch.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, no, no, you'll have your own room.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're wonderful.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're not so bad, either.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, you! And I became, for Whitestone, the ambassador to Syngorn. So I'm working on making a Teleportation Circle, is that what they're called?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You're having a Teleportation Circle placed within your estate in Whitestone, and at the end of the year it's still two weeks out from creation. So it's going to take a little while longer, but it is in the process.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And while Tary was living in the house--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Braiding hair.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my gosh, just doing so many things, we decided to make armor out of Vorugal, so I have new white dragon leather armor that Tary helped me enchant. Actually, that Tary enchanted and I hung out with him, for five months, while he did that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A lot of hard work, but I learned something from it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, that I'm really good company, basically.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And Trinket gives amazing massages.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. I think that's pretty much it, outside of the bakery, which has taken up a lot of time, really.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You did also research some--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes! I spent a fuckton of time! I'm building up my library in the house, so I spent a lot of time researching Orcus and the Raven Queen and learning everything that I can about all of them. All of them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. And Vax?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Everything's going to start to get a little intertwined here now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which is why I led it along this way, so, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Enjoyed not being on death's door every fucking day and relaxing and being the right hand of the Queen back in Zephra, and--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Chief.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm still learning the lingo. Getting to know Korren a bit more. Keyleth helped me-- I let a lot of blood and made a small altar to the Raven Queen in Zephra and it's been all flowered and vined out. And while we spent most of our time-- Oh, tattoos, want to talk tattoos?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, since Keyleth-- the mantle's a little heavy and flashy and a little formal to wear all the time, but wanted something to still represent my chiefdom.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you get antlers tattooed on your face? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just right there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like those elves in Dragon Age.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Keyleth goes hard, yeah. No, I got the traditional Ashari tattoos of the mantle across her chest and shoulders to mimic that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's super tight.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We went together. Yours took much longer than mine did. Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It took a while. It's old needle-and-hammer style. All traditional.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, and about two-thirds of the way through yours, they started on mine, which is just a pair of antlers on the right bicep here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: See, he got the antlers.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, did you really?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I did. Not on my face.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's great. That's so cute.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right next to the barbed wire.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We'd spent time in Whitestone. We went to Vasselheim a lot. The twins spent a lot of time in the library.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, we did.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Reading a ton. I spent a lot of time at the Raven Queen's temple, getting to know the people there, getting to know what the hell a cleric or a priest or a paladin of the Raven Queen does, since I didn't really have any time to do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Part of your process there, once you had been fully accepted into the Order there, some of the few responsibilities you had were, you were called whenever relatively important figures in the city had passed away, to go and give rites when they were interred and be present during a number of funerals in there. That was one of the earlier responsibilities that was given to you within Vasselheim while you were there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I tried to do a little observing, too, in Zephra as well. I didn't want to interfere with their customs, but it's like working at a funeral home, and over time you just get used to it. A couple of bits and pieces. I saw everybody, really. I went on a man's weekend with Grog and killed things, that was awesome. Talked a lot of shop with Pike. God talk. The girls went off on their own a little bit, so I spent time trying to figure out what it was Percival does in his workshop. He lent me a book about the history of Whitestone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I did, I also sent you on a tour of the frescoes, it was quite nice.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's beautiful, once you're not screaming, running on fire, you can really take in art and pass notes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It had been years since I'd done it without being on fire, running around. Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Also tried to locate Dr. Dranzel in an effort to find Scanlan, but was unsuccessful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You ate raw meat with me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, and kept it down.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You did. Like a champ.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you like me? Check this box.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Check one. Carry on, carry on.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, and last thing, Vex took me to Syngorn on one of her trips. Spent some time with little sis. Not as much time with Dad. Some time with Dad. We're all right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Eh, it's whatever.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you've arranged a respect. There is no familial bond, per se, with him, but a lot of the tension has died away and there is a business, positive interaction.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, there's finally this feeling that we don't need-- at least, for me-- his approval anymore, which is very nice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, and he acknowledges that, and he seems both simultaneously proud and sad, almost a mild regret that, perhaps, I think he realizes now what he missed out on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How fucking cool we are?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kind of.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just so fucking cool. Thanks for the note.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: In character, in character. You know, elfs going to elf, and there's no getting around that, so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Exactly. All righty, and I think I'm to Marisha as Keyleth. Keyleth, what you got going on?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And each city got assigned a separate color, to where if anything goes terribly wrong, someone can hit that beacon and all of the crystals will light up and whoever can respond first will do so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What if some shitty 11-year-old kid just runs up and hits it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They are heavily under guard.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh. Smart thinking.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: By a 12-year-old.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's like how calling 911 is illegal. You don't do that. You don't do that..

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughs)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Spent a lot of time working on my alchemy, in between. I imagine we have would have crafting parties in Whitestone, yeah? And then, you know, I would do some alchemy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I made friendship bracelets, she worked on her alchemy. So--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And he made dragon armor.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It looked so good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Girl better appreciate.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not like you have to make the armor, you commission the armor. You enchanted it for five months.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Took trips with Vax, and had him as my right-hand man.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Unnecessary bodyguard, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's his official title?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's Puddin'.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Coattails of The Tempest.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sir Vax. The Gothy One.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Cervix? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Maybe not that one!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's Cervex.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, and since you were the last of one of the intertwined events, the four of you-- Keyleth, Vax, Vex, and Pike-- all took a specific trip.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And Tary.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm sorry, Tary came along too. So the five of you guys took a journey into the Feywild in search of the Theatre.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (sings) The fuckin' Theatre.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It was amazing-- I wasn't there, but it was amazing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You weren't there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Such a good show.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They integrated rap, too. It was like--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: History? Wow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, it was like a whole new way to tell history. It was just so good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Faces. Bodies. And you begin to realize that these were all spirits of the marsh being summoned to this structure. You all went, disguised as various small flying insects-- or beast creatures-- and managed to stealth into the entrance doors, into this mossy marsh-rotted wood structure, and on the inside saw the mist form an audience, within the inside of this Globe Theatre-like structure, upon which the central platform remained. A strange, crystalline spark began to form upon that stage, where a doorway opened and then, stepping from it, a half-dozen elvish-looking figures, though their skin is pale white-gray, their eyes white and iris-less, their limbs lithe and thinner and longer than elves you're used to seeing in your experience. And, while none of you could understand-- or most of you could understand the language except for Keyleth and Taryon, I think it was?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, we were the ones that could.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you guys were the only ones who could understand it because you both knew Sylvan.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What you saw was a brilliant three-act performance for the undead spirits of the surrounding marsh. Unaware of the serious danger if any of you had been discovered. (laughs)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do tell, Matt.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I know. I want to know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. You don't know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Aliens!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go back. Go back. However, you watched the performance entirely, did not gather their attention. At which, the entity stepped back into a doorway, and it closed off and you absconded from the Theatre before the rest of the audience could shift its way out and become the mists of the Forests once again.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is their most sacred ceremony or something?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You only know what they told you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You only have what I told you later, it's pretty much--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. So as you guys returned from this and described your experience to Percy, the only person who really had spent a large portion of his youth researching the Feywild, and having an interest in these Fey creatures and their societies--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He didn't want to go! Yeah, he had things to copy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I had things to do, I wasn't entirely clear about what you were planning to do. My god!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, it's great! You didn't die, you weren't kidnapped, your soul wasn't taken, you weren't--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That could've happened?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, you watched the--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The Royal Troupe of the--

lines.name: TALIESIN, MARISHA
lines.text: Unseelie Court.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: For god's sakes. Yes, a lot could've happened. They have these little vignettes on occasion that they use to sort of-- it's like a nice little trap. They just like to grab people and use them for various things, no one really knows because no one ever comes back.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who are 'they'? The 'Unseelie court'?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're sort of the shadow court, I suppose. They would be the-- for everything that you saw in the Feywild, they are the thing that the Feywild is a little sketchy about and a little worried about.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, listen, man. If I can't have the arts in my life, I'd rather be dead.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I'm very impressed. You're going to have to draw everything. You're going to have to draw everything. It's very important.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They looked like Slendermen.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know what that means.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Very tall and slender.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So. Your adventure to finally find the Theatre, complete. I believe that concludes your immediate ventures. Percival.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I had the least vacation-y of anybody's vacation.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Of course you did.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 'Cause I have technically been on vacation for many, many years. I finally took the mantle of responsibility for not necessarily-- I'm not ruling Whitestone, that's not how it works, but I did take on a lot of the civic responsibility.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you guys converted into the Chamber of Whitestone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which is less of a singular family ruling and more of a small series of offices held by Lords or Ladies.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I hired someone to help run the-- my workshop.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: -- afternoons at the workshop, and then an hour and a half every night enchanting it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And then we drink.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But didn't it feel good, Tary, to get your hands dirty?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a blister! Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How awful.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So, with the help, I had time to start working on a few projects. I finally made a new pair of glasses. Well, I tried.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You tried.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: To make a new pair of glasses.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You rolled a one. And then you rolled a two.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And then I rolled again and tried to make a new pair of glasses. And then I realized it's very, very hard to make a pair of glasses when you can't see what you're doing because you don't have a pair of glasses.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Warby Parker.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So then I actually called Tary and said, please fix these for me. He made very, very nice glasses. I think they have your name inscribed on them, they're really gaudy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Rose gold is the best.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They were the Whitestone Musketeers until Cassandra said that that was silly and so they were called the Riflemen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Riflemen of Whitestone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm sorry, Percy, but no."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I began modernizing the city. I have a wonderful dream of turning Whitestone into a shining beacon on the hill of what the future of mankind could be. And the first order of business, one of two big projects that we've started to bring forth our reputation as this modern city, is we've been running steam pipes from the depths through the main streets so that the snow never needs to be uncovered, so that the streets are always clean, and a few of the major houses can be heated this way during the heavy winters.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a heavy endeavor, it's going to take a while to complete.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's not completed yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's begun work.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're also trying to create some series of illuminations at least within the main castle in case the thing in the basement that we're still working on ever turns on us and suddenly we are un-magiced, which is a constant fear. I've upgraded, with Taryon's help, we've upgraded several of my inventions. I've had a proper sword of my family crest made. I finally got the glove more-or-less working. More working, honestly, but I'll get into that later. I've been desperately trying to get you to stop going out into the woods to stop searching for that bloody thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've been a bit obsessed, I'm sorry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That covers quite a bit of it, at this point.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. That's pretty much everything you've got here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What'd you kill, in the year that you had off?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Time.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Time, and things in the woods, on occasion. We go hunting. And I've also been training men how to use their guns, so there's been a bit of that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Boring.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did you catch a whiff of Galdrick out in woods?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've seen a wolf, out and about, but he seems to do his job well, and I'm not going to stop him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Technically an honorary member of the Grey Hunt, I'd say.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, quite.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. And Taryon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Taryon had a great year.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're such a terrible person.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You've heard much of what he's done. Mainly just building and working and working and building. And in his spare time, he built and worked on things for himself. Chief among them, Doty! Doty 2.0, take this down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Tary."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, see?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh he fucking talks!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A little bit. Doty, how handsome am I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Tary."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I heard "very". And Doty, what do you say when it's windy outside?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Tary."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's airy. Right? That's what I heard. Oh no, boo!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Tary?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It depends on the context, you have to sort of figure out what he's saying. But he can say that, he can say one word. It took a lot of money to do that, but it was worth it. He's also got a couple of upgrades. He's got a waterproof slot for the book inside of him so he can store my book.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The door itself is also a crest.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, the crest of Vox Machina, right on his chest, emblazoned there. His arm works a little differently, his right arm, which we might see in some sort of competition at some point. And his left arm, thanks to Percival Fredrickstein von Mussel de something.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Bless you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's got a little hole right here in his hand, that--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was amazing!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Our hero!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're gonna pay for that, oh my God, I can feel the radiation.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It can't be for anything else. Anything else won't compare. Just change it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just a little hole.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Itty-bitty little hole.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How wide is the hole?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's got some girth.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well-machined.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But it can fire a shot, a bullet shot. I've never used it before, but it can shoot something.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Once, and then takes a short rest to reload.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yep. And I think that's the major improvements to Doty, other than the speaking and the other stuff. Let's see, what else did I do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You told me one other thing. Did that get jettisoned?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, I also bought him-- I bought a lot of stuff. I'm almost out of money, guys.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But you're making some, with the bakery.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That is not what I would call money.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You are technically a civil servant as well, so you're making money there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I'm talking about actual money that you can buy things with. I bought Doty a pair of boots.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The Boots of--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow, that's a lot of cards!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I bought a lot of stuff. The Boots of Elvenkind, so he's a little more stealthy when we go around.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't you have those, too?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I also tinkered with my armor, or did I have it tinkered on?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know how to make armor, so you had the armor commissioned, using the remains of Vorugal's hide. No, sorry, you have Vorugal-- the remains of Umbrasyl's hide.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, so I have breastplate armor that has black dragon scales embedded in it, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (gasping)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sneaky sneak!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You made a broom?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know we have a fucking flying carpet?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Now we have two brooms. We can leave those fuckers in the dust!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You really have no money left.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But I also bought some other things.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's now going to become Whitestone's FedEx though.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are we all getting any prezzies?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you back? You were gone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, is that the end of that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I wrote. A lot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just a lot of writing, and I'm probably halfway through that book by now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, it is coming up, and you all decided to celebrate your Winter's Crest festival this year, not in Tal'Dorei. You all instead made your way towards the Bay of Gifts, in Marquet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Tropical vacation.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now, how are you guys getting there? Are you taking a leisurely boat trip? Are you going via trees?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, we were leaving from Whitestone, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We were leaving from Whitestone because we'd all gathered there for--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, that's right, before you even left there, you--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's right, as you were saying, it is based on that festival, and of course Whitestone has its own paganistic rituals dating back many, many years.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've read about them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, you have now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I will start telling you about it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've so many text files to send you, my word. So usually at this time, the winter solstice, especially when we have a new Master or Mistress of the Grey Hunt, there's usually a celebration or a ball, and they're not every single winter's festival, but it does happen, but since this was the first, we decided to have a fancy party. She was bestowed with her crest and otherwise and we all dressed up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did she get a dope crown?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You don't get a crown, you get a cloak-y thing with a medallion piece.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Mantle sisters!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You don't really have to wear it, it's just something you get to own. But I also had a piece of jewelry commissioned for everybody.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've already got one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth helped you with this one specifically.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This one specifically, because I had to go find our friend in the Fire Plane.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Senokir, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's right, that's right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very happy to help you."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And we inform him that we buried his wife's ashes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And I greatly appreciated you being so honorable."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, Percy, do your thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What do you need from me?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have this design, and this requires some gemstones, and I have a limited amount of dragon scales from five dead dragons, and I was curious if you could make a hero's crest that is built around these five dragon scales, so that everyone who helped to slay these dragons will always have a token that proves that they were there and they were one of them. And then I also need one made without the dragon scales as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You may leave now."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we come back in, like, two weeks?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He'll call.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He'll call? Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is this like a-- do we wait here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Goodbye!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Goodbye."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (AOL voice) Goodbye.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which sets you off for a moment, there. But you are notified of their completion, and they're delivered, finished, by this imp.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're beautiful, and at the ball, I present all of these to you, and each is just a bit individual. And they are crested in the gems and in the dragon scales to give this color wheel of the red, the white, the blue, the green.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's really beautiful.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And there's one that doesn't have the dragon scales, but it's just got this flourish around it, and we give it to Taryon because these are meant to be built upon, as we will build upon ours. Your accomplishments will be built upon yours as well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you, Percy. That's very kind.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there a pin?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, where are they best affixed to wear our bling?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Anywhere you like.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't wear a shirt, so.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just right in your skin, Grog.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nipple piercing.

lines.name: GROG
lines.text: Right in the nips?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. Or you could use it as your piece clasp. You could put it on your-- you could put it anywhere. You could put it on your gauntlet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I use it to affix my mantle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. Right in the center of the mantle. Right there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're just something so that, in the worst-case scenario, anyone will always know who we are, and we will know each other. It can't be replicated. There's no one else who's made anything like this. There's not enough material to make anything like this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, I want to make mine my hairpiece.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And we've got to figure out how to start putting your accomplishments on yours soon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I hope to have an accomplishment to add to it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You have several already. You defeated a leviathan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure. I killed a marid, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You helped me unify the world, globally.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, go on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're a world-class enchanter.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Mm-hm, yeah, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Think of it much like your book.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pike, what do you like about me?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You are so great at baking.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My profiteroles are really good.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Profiteroles?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What did we name the profiteroles again?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Profite-roll for initiative?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Profiterolos!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Profiterolos!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's profiterolos!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're fun to fucking drink with.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Your money.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, thank you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Your hair is lovely.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It is, isn't it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's very shiny.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You're kind. You're very giving.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But thank you. Thank you. Doty, you got all that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Tary." (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jesus. No! (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So we just have a wonderful evening where we eat too much, we drink too much, we dance and we all look fabulous.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fabulous.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm only wearing the pointy helmet, Percy's ascot, and his glasses.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And that's it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No pants?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, I always have pants on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not always.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Also, I am not always wearing the Raven Queen's armor. I'm wearing some of Percival's loaner cast-of-Hamilton clothing right now. I, on the break, built a trapped box to slide under the bed so that I can let my skin breathe at night.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He doesn't smell as moldy after a year.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I smell lovely.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know, I've crafted him some oils with some herbs. He's good. I helped him manscape a bit, it's good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh! All right, and as you guys-- the ball is complete, you've all gathered. Your hangovers have faded. You all begin your trek toward the Bay of Gifts.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, are we sailing or are we bamfing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's up to you guys.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'd like to sail. I need a vacation.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (sings) Sailing.

lines.name: TRAVIS, SAM, MATT
lines.text: (sing) Takes me away, to where I've always---

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A little nostalgia in that for you, yeah?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's right.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Because I've sailed there before.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And we didn't go sailing with Pike.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Teach us some sailing songs. It will be fun.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Bah-derr.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And show us all the best gifs.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll show you all the best jifs.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's okay too. That's okay too.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, just kidding. I don't say that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't know what those are. All right, so you make your way to Emon, then you charter a ship across the Ozmit Sea and make your way to the continent of Marquet. On the northeast base of the Aggrad Mountains of Marquet, which consume a sizable portion of the continent's north shore, there before you stands, as it comes across the horizon, a brilliant crescent-shaped bay of white sands, glittering clear turquoise-colored waters, and the grandiose port city of Shamal.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Holy crap.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: God damn it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hundreds of ships fill the bay, from small fishing vessels to massive cargo ships, bringing an ever-flowing mixture of cultures, goods, and characters from across Exandria to its sunny location. Now, while back home Winter's Crest brings seasonal rain and snow, here in the Bay of Gifts the sky is clear, the water is warm, and the sun is ever-shining throughout the day. The streets of the city are draped in white and gold silks, affixed and framing crossways and street corners between torch posts and buildings. The distant sound of waves and seagulls cawing seems to envelop the city at all hours, occasionally stemmed by the sounds of localized musicians. So as you arrived here about midday or so, you take in the nice salty air into your lungs. You have your belongings, your sacks at your side, the city is bustling. What do you want to do with your vacation?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. What do we do with a vacation?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Straight to the house of lady fav-- (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't think I've ever done this before. I'm not entirely sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think we're supposed to just hang out and lay down in a hut and hang out on the beach.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We need a place to stay. Right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Preferably a fancy location.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: As close to the beach as possible.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my God, you've done this before, haven't you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We used to summer in warmer climes. That's right. And--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (gasping)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know what that is!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughs) (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you have, like, a racial advantage to find a place like this?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Teach us your upper-white-male ways!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will certainly be of help. I'm afraid I can't pay for us this vacation.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No-no-no-no-no-no-no.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is Vox Machina's vacation.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is a group vacation. This is what this is now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, let's find a resort of some sort. Or a relaxing spa! Or a---

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Some sandals.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughs) Yeah, sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) All right. So who's helming this journey here? This search for--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll helm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, make an investigation check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will help her.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. If you're helping her, that's advantage for her on it, then.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, ah!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh my gosh!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, well-- It doesn't matter, I rolled it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The one that got away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (hums) 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And come upon a place that was referred to you as Dalen's closet. D-A-L-E-N's Closet. Which doesn't sound majestic, but when you were eventually led to where it resides-- the best way I can describe it? It's a field of beautiful hammocks affixed to various tropical trees and structures that are built out of driftwood.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my God.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right next to a brilliant bright white sandstone structure that appears to be the actual resort, if you will. It's a wide tavern, single-story. But well-staffed, and not terribly busy. But it seems to be very nice, and akin to some of the best places you've been to in your previous excursions on vacation.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as you arrive there, you are met with a male, dark-skinned, somewhat balding Marquesian halfling at the front desk who smiles as you approach. He puts out his hands. "Welcome, "friends! You are here for a-- I imagine to stay within The Closet?"

lines.name: LAURA, ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Ah, I am Guath, and this is for all of you? I will have to charge "for your friend, I am sorry."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, well, he's not really a person, but--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You're lucky I'm not charging twice! He's a very big guy. That goes for that one as well."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He doesn't eat. So--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then he won't order food! But he's going to sleep somewhere, yes?"

lines.name: LAURA, TALIESIN, SAM
lines.text: He doesn't sleep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well then, is he okay with staying out on the beach?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Doty? Are you okay with staying on the beach?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Tary?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay, very well. So that would be ba-da-da-- seven and a half? Seven, we'll go with "seven. How long do you plan to stay?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A couple of weeks?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A couple of weeks, a week? Something like that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ten days? Ten days?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ten days is really good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Ten days?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll get bored after eight or nine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, we might hop around.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We should be so lucky.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know what he's about to do to me right now. I know what Matt's going to do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Let me see here." And he brings up this small abacus and starts doing math really quickly on the side you see. "Nine days, you said?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ten days.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Ten days, all right. We'll put that at an even-- with discount for friendships, 1500 gold "for the entire stay."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! Well, seems-- and food is included, I'm assuming.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) "Oh, no. I'm sorry."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where would we go eat?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, we have a restaurant within as well, and there are plenty of places to eat around the "way. We are happy to bring it to your quarters, but there is a surcharge for it, of course."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you going to do the thing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do what thing, darling?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Your thing.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do you have any specials?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: AAA discounts? (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Rotary club.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: AAA discounts, tenth night free situation?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Friends of J'mon Sa Ord.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Uh. We do not run discounts here, unfortunately. We are a very premier establishment "here in the Bay of Gifts."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So do you wish to stay or not?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, 1500 gold it is.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We wish to stay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's fair.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think we wish to stay. I think--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We never spend money on ourselves.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, we never treat ourselves.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. Ultimately our time is worth far more than our money, so-- let's just go with that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's very fair.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right! Fantastic!" So you pay off the 1500. Mark that off on the party gold. You are given some keys--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How about some free drinks?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Getting after it! Wasting no time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is training for your vacation next week.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (gasping)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Natural number.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What is your persuasion?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's 12.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It is?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pike!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why have we not had fucking Pike do things?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No shit!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my gosh!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Maybe, how about-- If we don't get free food, what about--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're telling him this he goes, "Well, I--" That's right, because you trained in persuasion as part of the skills feat. That's right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, all right! (laughs)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So your charisma is-- Sorry, just making sure on the math on this one. Don't want to get lost. What's your charisma?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Two. 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll go over the math later.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't recognize you, but we've had many travelers and you seem--" He looks over the group a bit, especially the large one. "Free drinks. Why not? I'd be happy to give you this."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, nice, Pike!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He reaches behind the counter and brings out a couple of these small wooden coins.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Tokens!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He passes them out "All right, that is five, six-- He doesn't drink, you said. So that is just "seven. There you go."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Thanks!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So seven for all of you! Enjoy your stay! If you have any questions, requirements, issues, "or anything, anything at all, you let me know. We can provide. Okay!" He gives you your keys, leads you to you guys'-- The rooms are clustered in fours, like a little square. They are all adjacent next to each other in groups of four, so there is two sections you guys are given, in square formation with small pathways, but all the walkways, all the alleys between these all just lead right out onto the beach.
