There are no solid walls on any of the hallways here, it's just the rooms that are closed off. Everything just goes-- you just step off into the sand.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is amazing. I'm already, I'm in love with this place.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We don't need to go anywhere. This is it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so. Anything you guys wish to accomplish specifically while you're here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, just get drunk and hang out on the beach.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I'm already peeling off my shirt.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah! Roll for fucking putting on swimsuits!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) That's great!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have a gift to give to Vax! I have a gift to give.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh yeah?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 'Cause we're in the Bay of Gifts.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've got my shirt up around my arms. What's up, buddy? (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know, we haven't talked much over this year since I've been helping your fucking sister.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, my sister has locked you up, it's true.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But, you know, I've talked to her a lot about how you have this ongoing sort of teasing war with Grog.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh yeah?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I have acquired something for you to use in this battle.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do tell, motherfucker.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (gasps) No!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Use it when the time is right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No! No, you are a sadistic bastard!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh my fucking God! I pull him into the tightest hug, and I give him a kiss on his forehead.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, oh, oh! No! Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You beautiful fuck! Slap! Let's go get in the fucking water! And I run off towards the beach.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That is the darkest thing I've ever seen. That is amazing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter) I think I know what it is. All right, so as you guys shed your armor, shed your weapons, put on your beach-faring clothing, you all one-after-one begin to charge your way down to the white beach sands of the Bay of Gifts just outside of the city itself.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are there any pool aerobics? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) No, but you're welcome to start one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I'll join the rest.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grog! Grog! Lift me like Dirty Dancing! (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (sings) Ahh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you wait until she gets to the water before you do that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You arc a good 15 feet before you go face-down in the sand.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Never mind.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, Keyleth runs out and goes, who wants to go scuba-diving?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 'Cause I can Water Breathe us, and we can go look at the coral reefs!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yay! Let's do it!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's do it! Let's do it!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We do that at some point, throughout the week.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which they don't go into in the Player's Handbook as often.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) You guys manage to explore the majority of-- over this journey, and multiple trips-- explore a lot of the underwater portion of the Bay of Gifts, which includes a number of wrecked ships, that have just been storms, this is a very, very prominent bay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's like the Bermuda Triangle!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do run into other individuals that are actually either scavengers or pearl-divers or people that deal with gathering kelp and various other forms of plant life off the ground for food or other purposes. It's a very thriving ecosystem here. The people that live within this bay utilize everything in the vicinity. You see that work here, it's quite fascinating, and you see all walks of life. You all are pale as fuck by comparison to the locals here, who live in the sun most of their life.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, me especially.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But everyone there is friendly. You're little white-ass beacons underwater.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we see any mermaids?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are no mermaids in this bay that you find. Sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Next vacation.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I turn to Pike and Vex and go, hey! Hey! Underwater tea party!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Are you going to join?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to find pearls!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll go diving for pearls! Oh, yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Each of you who wants to go pearl-diving, make an investigation check.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I want to.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I want to go!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I look for shark's teeth? That's fun! Can I do a nature check?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm building a sand castle while they're doing that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Investigation?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll help you with that sand castle.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's good!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I got a five. I definitely didn't find a pearl.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have no luck under the water, but you do find a couple of shark teeth-- at least they look like shark teeth-- along the sands of the beach that have washed up on the shore.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't, what did you roll again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21, okay. You do manage to find one pearl, it's small but it's pretty. You manage to find a pretty decent pearl. You're not entirely certain-- make an intelligence check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, I'm okay at that. Not today, though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you feeling Lucky?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm not burning Luck on this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've burned it on lesser.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm not burning it on this. 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13, okay. You gather the pearl you gathered is worth 150 gold.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you want this? I don't. You can have it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I rolled 22, as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You and Percival both find similar pearls. Imperfect, maybe worth ten to 15 gold.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't want to sell it. I just want to have it. It's pink.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Lovely.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you rolled a five?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I rolled a five. I found a boob.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You found a sea cucumber.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's the sea hairs that squirt the ink?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not that type. It doesn't seem to have any sort of defense mechanism. It sits there sadly in her grasp.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: By the way, I should probably toss out, because we probably haven't all been half-naked together-- you know this, some of you have, but not all of us together-- I still have this big mark in the middle of my chest. This black, veiny thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a dark spot that looks like a bruise that never quite went away.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: FYI.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Tattoo's looking good, though.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Tary, do you know what I hear they do on beaches? You bury someone up to their head in sand.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you want me to bury you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I start doggy digging between my feet. I go into a Rage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You could walk away right now. He'll never know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Big hole right there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What you don't notice is another traveling couple that's lying on the beach about 15 to 20 feet away are now completely buried in sand with their drinks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I end my Rage. Get in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, sure. We're friends.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, totally friends.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. I'll step into the gigantic hole.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You step in. Doty watches you get inside, not really having an opinion on this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why didn't you pay for our rooms with all your money?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've spent a lot of money.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How much?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A lot.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How much do you have left?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not a lot.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I stop. Just so his arms are out, like that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, this is fun. I should have taken my armor off first. It's chafing me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All of you guys are beach-dressed except for Tary!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I thought this was a formal trip.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sand's gotten all in the metal joints and the inside of the armor.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know salt water is bad for the armor, right?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You should go change.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You should.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Doty, lift me up, please.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Taryon." Puts you down.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He just evolved.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I know. I feel like he said Taryon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tary. It should have been Tary. Good catch.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Undress me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He pulls off the breastplate, starts taking off the armor pieces. You are now currently down to your skivvies.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Great.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you want to build a castle?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's build the best castle ever.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fucking A, man. Do you know how to do that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I know how to do that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you trained in sand castle building?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I am a tinkerer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, and some of those tools may come in handy. You know what I'm going to do on this?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sand castle rolls.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, we're making rolls for sand castles.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No shit? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For this, we'll have a skill test for you, because you are a brute strength individual. This is going to be a dexterity check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you're following his plan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to go to my history knowledge and try to base it on one of the famous castles from my youth, of my land.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, from the Dwendalian Empire.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: From the Truscan Empire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Truscan area. I misspoke in an earlier episode. The Dwendalian Empire of King Bertrand Dwendal.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Everybody looks over and Castle Ravenloft is towering above the beach.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Exactly, yeah. So, make your dexterity check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Four!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Taryon, go ahead and make your history check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Great. You get the structure built. You map out the right scale structure of this castle, and you get about three-quarters of the way through before Grog (shifting sand).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What did you do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (sighs) You know, maybe we should have-- you know, let's just try one more time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. What did we do wrong the first time?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just be very careful, Grog. Because you were backing up and I think you knocked into it a little bit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You putting this on me?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It was probably Doty.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Probably. Doty, go walk over there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Tary." (impact sounds)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, he listens to me now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He walks over about ten feet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, let's do one more try.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And really put some artistry into this. We want a moat, we want defensive towers. I'm going to put a little alchemic fire in the middle of it, so if anyone gets through the gates, they explode.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow. Dungeons?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Of course.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With alligators in the moat?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, now make an intelligence check to lay out the design.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just straight intelligence?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just straight intelligence.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Come on, Gil. Five.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're with the worst sandcastle partner.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This one's bigger. This one's coming along great. You're glad the first one fell over because now this is going to be much better.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, yeah, this is coming along great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (sliding sand)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: God fucking-- Grog! You stepped-- I mean, the central structure held the whole thing! I'm getting a sunburn because we've been here for so--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just do that. Bury me again.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: While that is happening, may I hide Taryon's clothing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Aren't you skin-diving?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Time is loosey-goosey. Aren't we playing Dungeons and Dragons here? It's up to him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see the opportunity.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm getting him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a sleight-of-hand check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sleight-of-hand check? Natural 20!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A gentle pass by, choosing the right moment in which Grog is involved in rage-burying and Taryon has completely given up on his activities, you manage to scoot through the sand, and moving your hand behind you to hide the trail, you drag his armor off back towards the resort.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yoink.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. As you've been buried now, sufficiently--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All the way up to the head this time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Up to the neck. You feel the sunburn is starting to kick in a bit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (sighs) I need that helmet, Doty! My helm, please.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The giant reflective piece of metal?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're going to cook in that thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Tary."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where did it go?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Tary."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't tell me "Tary!" Your number one job is to take care of me, and your number two job is to take care of my belongings! That stuff is worth more than you!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Tary."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, just get me out of the hole.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (impact noise)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: By your head.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ow!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I hand him a seashell. I'm sorry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's go find my armor. I'm going to go look around for it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a survival check, because you're now tracking.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Survival? Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, no. That's a four, so that's three. I'm a negative one for survival. I thought it was 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You spend the next hour asking from person to person on these white sands.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Excuse me, pardon me. Sorry to interrupt your vacation. Have you seen a lot of armor and a big golden helmet? No? Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does everybody speak Common?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A lot of people do. This bay, in particular, because this bay is a bastion of trade.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're all German tourists.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Exactly, yeah. It's a Swiss drop area. It's great. But while everyone here, for the most part, speaks Marquesian, a majority speaks some level of Common.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was just curious if he was walking up to people and they were staring, going "oh no", and walking on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're tired and you're sunburned and you're exhausted. You walk out and see him in this state.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And by the way, I went to the front desk and I asked which room Mr. de Rolo was staying in, because I wanted to put some of his belongings there, and I hid the armor in Percy and Vex's room.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You'd better have been able to actually convince them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which is what I'm about to get to. Make a deception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Persuasion, you say?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Deception.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Deception. That's a 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20. Okay, it takes a little bit of convincing, but eventually he sends one of the employees to go along with you. They let you into the room.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And now I'm coming back to the beach.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so as you guys come in at the close of the day-- you've been here for a few days as part of your excursion here-- you all come in as you've had enough time in the sun and you probably need to get out for a little bit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tary, come here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: While you were messing about with Grog, Percy grabbed your shit and hid it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Percival?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My dear friend?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He was chortling the whole time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't believe that he would do such a thing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. I walk away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's go to Percy's room. I'm going to go knock on his door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you in your room, currently?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh god, no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No answer.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I try the door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's locked.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, I can open any fucking door.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where have you been all our campaign?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It took us a year.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're like a Swiss army knife of fixing all our problems and trolling.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have the same room.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What of his belongings are there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Of yours?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Of his.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Of Percival's. That would be-- because you didn't bring everything.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My stuff and Vex's stuff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so pretty much all of Percival and Vex's belongings are within the room.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Here, take a look. Guns, swords, boots.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What can we do, Doty? What can we do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Tary."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "Kill them all, you say?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "But they need their skin to live!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. I'll go to my cloak and tear off the Patch of Two Mastiffs.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're two big dogs, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, all right. And I'll throw some kibble all over the place and be like, go on, just chew everything up and make a mess and pee wherever you want.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, as you pull the patch and throw it in the room, it glows a bright orange and then flashes and burns into two small coal-like embers that when they slam into the ground, crack and open, and from those two embers you see two full-grown mastiffs. (barking and snorting)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's food in there. Eat it all. Scratch through everything you want.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They both start eating. They go nuts on the place.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And use this as your latrine as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One of them goes, (sniffs) and just pisses on one of the sacks. You're not quite sure which one it is.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Good doggy. All right. You're free now. Go away. I don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you leave them in the room?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know. I feel weird. I don't need a pet right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You leave and close the door behind you? Okay. All right, so you guys meet up again. You get more drinks, you begin to wander the city. Is there anything else you want to do while you're out and about for the afternoon?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I want to get my hair braided with beads on the end! (cheering)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And Grog.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just the beard?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you walk inside, there's one woman who's sitting there, in the process of eating a small bowl of fruit. You see she is a dark-skinned Marquesian, but elf lineage. She has elven features. Her hair, which is this dirty brown, is braided in rows that go down past her waist and have a series of multi-colored, looks almost like gems and rings and other cool pieces of jewelry that are woven into it. As she's looking at this small book in her lap and eating the fruit, she turns around. "Oh, I'm sorry. Hello."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hi. Could we get our hair-- yours looks amazing. Could we get some hair braids? Tight and then going down, with some gems and sparkles in it? And same here, on his beard?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, the beard. I can do that."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, of course." Closes her book and sets it down. "Come, sit."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Some razor blades up in them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She calls out in Marquesian for a moment, and a younger woman, probably about 15 or so, comes out. Human, dark-skinned, as well. Both begin to start working on your hair and your beard. Asking about where you're from. It becomes a conversational piece because you're there for a good hour and a half or so to go through all of your hair and get it done, but nevertheless, you now have a fantastic series of braids in your hair.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She pulled really hard.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It looks really good. Do you want to add any jewels in it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jewels?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Earrings and stuff like how she has?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I just want the beads. Little beads and little braids. No jewels. What about you?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I want all of it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Everything?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Just all of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All of it?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What does all of it cost?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you want more than what I have in mine--"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, no. Let's not get carried away.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you want extensions?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: My hair is already so long.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It is. Do you want other colored hair in there, too?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Let's put blue in there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, you wish to color?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, well--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, it's okay."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, why not? Fuck it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She talks to her assistant, and the young girl runs off for a second with a smile. Comes back, and there is what looks to be some sort of a fruit. Looks like a blue pomegranate that's partially crushed. She takes it and with a mortar and pestle setup begins mashing it and goes, "We can do blue."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So cool!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The whole endeavor between the two of you guys is not inexpensive-- few things are in the Bay of Gifts. It's designed specifically to survive and thrive on the trade here. Both of you guys, it costs about 120 gold.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not a problem.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So how does that break down? For my hair versus his?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are paying straight cost of the beads. Time "and training, of course, on our end, and we do the finest work you'll find all across Marquet."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, you know what? I am a very big supporter of small businesses, so support small business, and I will give you 120 gold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The 20 is mainly for him. The 100 was to give you the dye coloring--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, it's for both of you guys? Oh, I thought it was 120 each!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's all right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's not bad. I mean, that's a lot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's still a lot. But since you've gotten here, you get the sense that it's-- by nature, everything here costs a little more. A lot of it's imported and a lot of it is designed for people that are willing to pay for foreign goods.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Great.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are we supposed to tip?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, she owns the business so you don't have to do as much.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you there?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Just 120.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Very well. So how much blue did you want to get in your hair?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Say again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How much blue did you want to get in your hair?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Just some strips, you know. Just some strips on the white so it pops out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Just like--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You know, dealer's choice. Just get creative and do what you want.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Okay. So upon completion-- It's very cool. It's pretty close to what you were hoping and expecting. You end up with three streaks: one central one that goes from the center, and then two that go from the sides and back that way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's way different than I expected.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's awesome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And then all the tips go to blue, so it's almost like you have these two blocks of white and then eventually it all goes blue towards the edge.

lines.name: ASHLEY, TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Imagine what that'll look like when your hair is down, too, because it'll be like blue all over the top and all mixed in everywhere.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Ooh, that's pretty cool.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hell yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So yeah. Anything else you want to accomplish, or call it an evening?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think just eat a nice dinner and then head back to the rooms and get ready to wake up in the morning and do all the same shit again.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Definitely some magically frozen daiquiris.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percival and Vex-- how long do the hounds last for?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let me look.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a good question.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's not like a spell or anything, they are two dogs that live now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I am so excited. I am so excited.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They don't live for much longer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So, as soon as you approach, you guys hear, through the door on the other side, this low growl. This (growls).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Vex?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I open the door. Just fucking on guard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What the fuck!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I grab the door and shut it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who did this?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Those are really the only two people who could be possibly responsible--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grog! And I take off running to his room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. (laughs)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm not missing this. I am following.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Your door is open, Grog. You're just there sitting down for a second just grabbing your jug. Getting a quick nip before your next nip.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, mini-fridge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And Vex just storms in, heaving mad.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey. Oh. Hi.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you have anything to do with this? (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I feel like I should ask what, but the answer's probably yes?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The fucking dogs. Grog! I grab him by his beaded beard and drag him back to the room.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ah! It's really tight! (yelps)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percival, as you catch up-- She comes around the corner just dragging Grog by the beard behind her.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh god, she's going to kill you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (groans) What in the-- what-- (groans)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I open the door and throw him in. Did you do this?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (sniffs) Ugh. What the fuck?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The dogs have stopped mating at this point and one of them comes over and goes (sniffs, chomp) and just bites into your neck. It does nothing, it just rests there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is this your fucking dog?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is this your fucking dog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No! Where am I going to get dogs from?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Although I don't think this shit and piss is mine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) That's good.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What does our room look like? What does our stuff look like? Is it ruined?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your stuff isn't--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not the magical items.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The stuff in the closet is probably--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You didn't just leave your stuff on the floor, there. You had things put away inside the cabinets and stuff. And the things that were in the cabinets were fine. So most of your general clothing is all right. It's more like your sacks, anything that was just loose. Your boots. All just smell of dog piss.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I let the mastiffs have a couple of licks from the alchemy jug full of beer that I was drinking out of?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They do have a lick. Big old mastiff tongues.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to go find Vax.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's in the process of going through the books, making sure he's keeping everything tidy and he sees you approach. "Ah, hello! Is there anything of--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who-- Hi.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hello."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who was in our room? Did you send anyone to our room?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Uh. Yes. Yes, there was--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who was it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The other who looks like you. He came by and said that he was supposed to put the-- "We had to send--" (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "He said he had to put things in the room for you. I am so sorry. I am so sorry. If this is "a problem, we can call the-- You wish us to call the guards over here?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (scoffs) How? Why? Vax! And I take off running. Vax! Where are you? Where are you?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm in my room.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have just turned the corner towards Vax's room. I'm probably just now in eyesight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I sprint and I--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just showered, you guys, now's not a good time. I'm just--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket, off with me, we're ready to fucking fight. He's out of my necklace and we're taking off towards Vax's room.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did you say you're coming to the room?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You are dead.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I hear this?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, practically.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can too.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're all making our way over to Vax's room.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think that my sister is coming. Whoa!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hi, Vex.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Put some clothes on.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I guess I will as well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I feel like we're in trouble.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yoink. What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What the fuck did you do? Why the fuck would you do that in our room?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What did I do in your room?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Destroyed it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Why would I destroy your room on the first day of our vacation?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you-- Did he-- Did you-- Why would you?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I wouldn't. What are you talking about?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The dogs. Shit and piss everywhere. I know you were in our room.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Dogs?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There are dogs? (gasps) What kind of dogs are they?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why don't you come with me and I'm going to go show you while they talk.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you pranking me? What are you talking about?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh. I just yank your hair as hard as I can.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (yells) What are you doing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why would you do it? Why?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do what? You have to be more specific.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Dogs. Shitting and ruining everything in our room.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What the fuck are you talking about? Dogs? I don't have any dogs.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't you lie to me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't have any magic. I can heal a little bit and that's it. What are you talking about?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're not even magic dogs, they're just dogs! Can I roll to see if he's fucking telling the truth?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an insight check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll make my deception check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Kiki, we've always been friends.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, of course.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want you to know this is nothing personal but this is--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is that your second Luck?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, it was.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's the second Luck, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I open the door and show you. And then I shove you in and shut the door for a moment.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see he's covering up. You don't quite know the full specifics, but you know he's covering.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know you were in our room and I know you're lying to me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was not in your room. I am not lying to you, I don't-- (yells)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I just yank him out of the room. Trinket!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What are you-- what?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sic him! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, she's pulled you out into the hallway. You now see, the bear you've grown up with and loved, for the first time, you realize how massive and scary this bear could be as it (growls, heavy steps).

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I click my Boots of Haste!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You were fucking naked a second ago.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket charges you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is improvisation. If I say it, it's real. That's how this fucking works.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You were putting on your boots?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So what are you doing? Trinket's coming at you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm running in my boots!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have the back of his head. I have his hair.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Disengage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So hold on. She does have your hair.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically, it's a grapple.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. You want to make it a strength check? I know my strength is double hers.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) Your strength is double mine?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's athletics and acrobatics versus her--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Oh, acrobatics, okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Versus my strength?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll double-check real fast. I should remember this, but for this one particularly I want to make sure that I get specifics right here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is so great.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) I didn't expect it to go this way.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I vaguely wonder what you actually had planned for this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not all this!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is bedlam, at this point.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This went in a whole different direction.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, yeah. It's athletics or acrobatics versus her athletics.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I will choose acrobatics.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Motherfuck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll your acrobatics. Roll your athletics.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ugh, it was almost good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Six!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You slip out from her grasp right as Trinket comes upon you. What's your speed?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fucking wicked, man. I'm double-speed, so 60.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't have your boots on, you just put your pants on!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Weren't you in the shower?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You mimicked putting your pants on.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. 30.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Trinket's movement is?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, he's got 40.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as an older couple emerge from the room down the hallway and go, "Nope." And close the door.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I see food trays left by other customers. I start knocking them down and dumping food on the rug behind me as I run. It's improv. It's real!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are small baskets.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I said I saw food!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so you knock some baskets behind you and you keep running. You just emerge from the edge of the hallway. You can see the beach ahead of you. You can see the little bit of moonlight hitting the sand in front.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's around me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hallways and doors.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is our room nearby? Did he see me get shoved in?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He wouldn't have seen you get shoved in, but he would have seen me in the hallway at this point, if he passed her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say you moved one direction. Trinket went and chased him down the other side, so this is going away from you guys.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey, Vax? I think they're really mad at us.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Little busy, little busy, little busy!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just as you emerge to part of the sand and you think you're home free, you stop hearing Trinket's footfalls. (whack) Leapt and just impacts you on the sand and both of you tumble, end-over-end, through the sand. Eventually, you land flat on your back and Trinket pounces on top of you, your breath (groans) as your chest gets closed in. And right up in your face, pinning you down, going (growls).

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I immediately start doing this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is me rubbing his tummy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. Don't fall for it, Trinket!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are pinned by a very heavy bear, to the point where your breathing is (shallow panting).

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You hear from under the bear, (muffled) I have been here before, and I will be here again!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You ruined all of our things.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did I ruin it? What did I ruin? I still don't know what happened.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Vax, you let two dogs loose in our room and they shit and pissed all over everything, and our bed is ruined. They were fucking in our bed!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I did not fucking let two dogs--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then what did you do? I know you were in our room. I know you're lying to me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was there for five seconds. I put Taryon's armor under the bed and then I left. I was in there for 30 seconds. I don't have any dogs. I don't know dogs.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why would you put Taryon's armor in our room?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Because it was fucking hilarious!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait a minute.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's the trolliest thing you've said, ever!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you tell Tary?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I did.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So Tary did this?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What happened?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Someone let two giant dogs loose in our room, and they destroyed our things. Just destroyed it. And now, on top of having everything ruined, we're probably going to have to pay for damages. Which will be coming out of your funds, by the way.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's the funniest bit, because I have no money.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket's head slowly turns over back towards you with a, "What?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just a little time. And I walk.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you walk away, Trinket's head moves back to you, and if you could see a bear smile?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. When she's gone and it's just us, I say, she thinks I care. I don't care. Does she let you kiss her? No, she doesn't. But you get to kiss me all you want, so have at it, buddy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket goes, (grunts).

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's all right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (groaning and laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You got pissed on.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've been inside a dragon's fucking stomach, buddy. I don't care. The beach is 50 feet that way. Get it all out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, while you're pinned there, you march off. You guys just now catch up to the chaos.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come here!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth's currently getting the mastiffs out of the room.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I Speak With Animals to them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Good boys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where did you have beef jerky?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fish jerky from where we were at the casino earlier.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh snap!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As Liam O'Brien said, it's improv, so that makes it true!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm just wondering--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You fucking made out that you were hiding in crystal clear bathwater, motherfucker! If you say it, it's real!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right, so just like the internet, if you say it, it's real. Come here, boys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Animal handling.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've got to have some advantage for being a fucking druid, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's a one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you say, "Come here, boys." They both look at you. They rush up, grab the jerky out of your hands, and dart out of the room. You hear them, (barks) vanishing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck these dogs! That's why you said we should never own dogs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Taryon?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Doty, could you sing to me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (sings) "Tary. Tary. Tary." It's all the same. It's all horribly mechanical-sounding and echo-y. It's not singing more than it's repeating your name over and over again in the same intonation. It's horrifying.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Percy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're going to have to help us clean at least our personal belongings.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I didn't do this! I'm more than happy to help, but I just want you to know: I had nothing to do with this.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, I know. I know you had nothing to do with this. He's useless. You're not, so I'm going to make you help on his behalf.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It smells like shit. Like a giant fucking locker down shit in here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Worse than hell. Legitimately worse than hell. This is making me miss hell.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to cast Control Water. Can I magic this clean-up like it's Fantasia or some shit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is Prestidigitation.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, can I Control Water and levitate the urine?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, totally.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You know what? Yes, I'll let you do that. I will let you Control Urine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I am the leader of my tribe, and I am doing janitorial duties. Ugh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: After completing your Aramente, after years of training in the druidic arts and becoming the leader of your people, you are reduced to lifting the urine from a ruined hotel room.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would like you to meditate upon who is responsible for this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fucking Vox Machina pieces of-- why am I-- why are we us?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is your boy. I'm taking no responsibility for this one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I control the water and fling it into the ocean.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I control a little of the urine that dribbled in the hall, as well. I don't want us to get kicked out by the hotel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The room's still destroyed. For the sake of brevity, here--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Some wild dogs attacked our room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who's talking to the manager about this?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Percy is.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll speak to the manager.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (giggles) Wild dogs?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wild ocean dogs. Beach dogs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So at this point, while all this has happened, Guath, the gentleman at the front, sees the bear and is like, "What is going--" (yelps) The dogs go (barks) and jump past him. The slightly chubby halfling comes forward. "What the fuck is going on?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You tell us, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, you tell me. This is my place! Whose dogs were those?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have no idea. We came back and they were in our room, pissing on our stuff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is not deception!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You know whose they are.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Actually, do I know whose they are?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've been hearing it over the earring this whole time.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know where they came from.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's true, he hasn't said.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll do deception.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Persuasion.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What the fuck, man?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, god damn it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Honor yourself.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm honoring myself. It doesn't matter, anyway. That's 27.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He goes, (sighs).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, it was upsetting. Your property, our property. This is our problem. All of us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Let me see." He pulls past and makes his way towards the room, and looks inside, and you can see him go, (distressed noise).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Has this happened before?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The breed? They don't exist!" (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've never seen anything like it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (exclaims in a foreign language)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How good a job did you do on our stuff?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It still smells terrible in there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Your clothes and bullshit is fine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm so sorry."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's hardly your fault. This is ridiculous.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We'll get you a new room immediately. Hey!" Two servants come out immediately. He starts shouting out to them in Marquesian. They walk off and eventually people start coming in and pulling your stuff out of the room and taking it to another chamber. It's down two halls over, so you guys are separated from everybody else.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have a lot of foreign guests as well, in our establishment back home, so I know how things can sometimes get a bit crazy, and I certainly don't want to put any undue pressure on you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, it is okay. We will launch an investigation immediately."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Excellent.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So. (laughs) Vex, anything else you want to do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I want to go knock on Tary's door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear through the doorway this really creepy, "Tary. Tary."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll take off my blinders, my night-blinders.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do they actually have little cucumbers drawn on them?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My mask. Come in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you have Doty singing to you again?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, yes. He sings me to sleep now. It's sort of a ritual we have.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I shut the door.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you have a nice night, Little Elf Girl?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I didn't, Goldie. Actually, did you happen to set a couple of dogs loose in our room?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, between you and me, I did.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, you did?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You see, Percival played a little bit of a prank on me, and I got him back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. Well, you also got me back, and actually, it wasn't Percival, it was my brother who did it. Stole your armor?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But he told me that it was--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He told me--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, and you believed him over your two best friends?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You've taught me so much, but not about the human heart. (sighs) I am so sorry. I should have trusted you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You should've!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I should have not doubted my staunchest ally, Percival. Of course, someone as trained as he is in the sciences wouldn't lie to me like that. I failed you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tary, you know I can't stay mad at you!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What can I do to make it up?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Doty, go clean their room.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you, dear.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm so sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, it was disgusting.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But your brother.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know! Trinket peed on him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Trinket peed on him? Well, that's pretty good. I feel like there's more revenge to be had, but you know what? We're on vacation.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Over their earrings, they hear, he also dropped a loaf.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He also dropped a loaf, apparently.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's nice. All right. I'm so sorry. Will you forgive me?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course I do, dear. Have a wonderful night's sleep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You, too.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll send Doty back when he's done.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He can last forever, so just as long as you need him. He'll wash whatever you need. He has motor skills. Not fine motor skills, but he could try to sew something if anything was ripped.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll check it out and I'll let you know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And if you ever need more dogs?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're the man to call.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I see Doty appear, correct?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know why you're here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Enters the room.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are our things even in our room anymore?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your things are being brought out in pieces, but the two employees see Doty enter and set them down and Doty starts picking things up and dusts them off. Starts picking up the piles of dog feces.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Tary, call him off.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sorry?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Call him off.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm sorry? Call him off?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Call him off.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's cleaning your things.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No. We're getting another room.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What is he throwing away?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Starts heading back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I should have been more specific.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't think he's very sanitary.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is my earring, by the way.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is how I have to talk with it. I have to dangle it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm well aware.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I'll be right there to give him more specific instructions.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to sleep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm coming.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you improve the reception by moving it around?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Over the course of the evening, the room gets cleaned as best as it can.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We do not tell them what our new room number is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Before I go, real fast, letting you guys know, we have another giveaway tonight. This is a nice purple heart Wyrmwood mini holder, which is pretty rad.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that what I have?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Enjoy Liam's episode of Signal Boost.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's so good!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Man, that was pure Dungeons and Dragons. I took a little pebble and dropped it and it turned into a frigging avalanche on the side of Everest.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That reminded me of the old home games quite a bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Bringing us back in. You guys have been travelling across the Silvercut Roadway, through the dividing plains of Tal'Dorei, onwards to the Alabaster Sierras, and eventually to the homestead of Whitestone. You guys have made your way back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We catch up on so much gossip.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) So you arrive. What do you want to do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, actually, now that we're home, I would like to try and find Pike once we're in and settled.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you guys all get settled and you find your way to your rooms. The afternoon comes to a close for the evening, and everyone's gone off to do their business and prepare for a dinner, we'll say, in about an hour.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Cool. Hey. Hey. Oh, sorry.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hello?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey, it's Grog.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, come in!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Huh, what?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hi, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hi! Hey. Hey. Hey. So, can I shut the door? So I--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, okay. I shut the door. So, I have a secret.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Ooh?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, okay, okay, okay, okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, so. When we beat Thordak, I was rummaging around and all of Emon's treasures were in this one place and everybody was like, "Meh, we want to heal," and I found these little gifts, and one of them was this little itty-bitty deck of cards.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (gasps)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know, right? Now, here's the thing. It was in a really pretty box: wooden box with gold all over it. I tried to open it, and it wouldn't, so I smashed it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Naturally.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like you do.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I took it out. And I drew a card from it, and this magic sword appeared in my hand.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (gasps) So something magic comes out of it when you pick one? Can I pick one?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Do you want to?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. So I also went and I was journeying around. I went to Vasselheim. Now, here's the thing. Vex was like, "No, don't pick one, it's dangerous. Mm."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, it can be dangerous?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, no. She's afraid that it's dangerous, right? Because the sword, it turned to rust, and I got a headache afterwards. Whatever.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Oh.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But I think I didn't handle it right. But I went to Vasselheim, and I had this other guy pick a card. You know?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And he picked a card. He got two Wishes.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just like that! And he made himself--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That sounds like the best thing ever.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know! He's the Lord of the Crossroads.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: The Crossroads.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (gasps)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's rich; he had a servant who appeared out of nowhere. All of a sudden he had fuckin' dope-ass threads.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Should we-- Whoa. Should we pick a card?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, what do you mean this sword gave you a headache, Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, I don't know. So it was a magic sword, right? I was going to be able to throw it and it would fight without me. Like it would just fight things that I told it to.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Was it evil?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No! I tried talking to it and it didn't say anything.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, that's a--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We have a history.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's a red flag.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know. I have a history of, you know.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So it didn't talk back to you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It fought on its own.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: A guy that you met, you made him just rich and amazing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Pretty much. I think it's a Deck of Fortunate Things.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: A Deck of Fortune?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think so. I mean, I haven't really looked at it too closely. Do you want to look at it with your knowledge?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I mean, I don't, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't know if I have the knowledge, but I'll look at it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right. I give her the deck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (gasping)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But what's your skill? What's your skill bonus?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Plus one. So 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you take the small sack that contains the cards, and you pull the deck out of it, and you inspect it from the outside. Just checking the inscriptions. You've heard things about magical decks of cards. Sometimes they're used to see the future. Sometimes they're used for different types of augury and divination. You might've heard a myth or two about a card deck that can alter reality in good and bad ways. That's as much as you are able to glean from this.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I tell which cards are good and which cards are bad?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I figured the answer would be 'no'.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you do know from looking at this, while the name doesn't come to you, you're able to ascertain this seems to be very, very in line with the fate-altering deck of cards, the one you've heard can do good and bad, and is as powerful and dangerous as it is interesting.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I feel like I've heard of something like this before.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: But sometimes you can choose a card that will do very bad things.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So it's like a 50/50 chance that you could get something very good. Like, you have your fortune change, you become a king, all of this thing--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or you make a bad person a king?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Or you get a magical sword. Or if maybe someone-- you could just die instantly.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't know, maybe. Something along those lines.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But we're good people, so good things would happen to us.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (strained) Oh, it just sounds so fun though.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know, right? And think about my previous experience. There is nothing bad that has happened in what I've seen so far.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) Oh god.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, do you want to pull one or should I pull one? Or should we not?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know. I mean, like, I kind of want to. I mean, so like. Like bad things.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What could be that bad? I mean, if someone were to die, we could do a Resurrection spell.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How could it just outright kill you? Well if you die, I can't do a spell.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (sighs) I don't know what to do. I don't know if we should. I don't know if we should test the fates.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We should flip a coin.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Let's flip a coin.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. Do you have a coin?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, I have a coin.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, you do? That was lucky.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Did you--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "We shouldn't test the fates, let's flip a coin." (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you want me to flip a coin for you?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can roll a 20.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh yeah, no. We have coins.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've got one on hand right now, beotches.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you want to?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's up to you guys. This is entirely your call.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Here it is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, Melora.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Coming in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There you go.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What if all the good ones are gone?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Heads or tails. Okay, so one is heads.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Heads, because that's all bad in the heads. But the tail is the booty, so.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, but what is what?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So what's what? 20, we pick a card. One, we do not.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 20, we don't pick a card.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: 20, we don't pick a card.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 20 is sensible. One is ridiculous.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You are not here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's both of those. You said we'd pick a card both sides.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah. One, we pick a card. 20, we don't.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Who picks the card? Or should we--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We should flip for that too.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, okay, I'm going to check it. Oh, we don't pick a card.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But that was for you, you flipped. And now I flip.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You know what? It's safer this way.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It is?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think so. Because what if we would've gotten something bad? Did you want me to hold onto it? Or do you want to hold onto it? I'm just afraid you're going to pick it and be alone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I want it. I really want it. It's real important to me.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do not. Pick it. Alone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Who did you make the promise to?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Vex.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, you live your life how you want to--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You said 'alone' so if I was like really, (distressed noise) I need to, I come to you--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And we pick it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. Deal.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thanks. You're sure you don't want to just, like, slide one out and just take a look at it?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Just take a peek?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (strained) I want to so bad.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That is fate. Helping us.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Was that another 20?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They both want to do it so bad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Moving on from that scene before they change their mind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll say for the point of the narrative, a couple of weeks go by, relatively unimpactful.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I get my circle!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, the Teleportation Circle is complete.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, guys. We can go to Syngorn whenever we want.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, rad.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tight, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The question is, do we want to?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Probably not!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I go check in with the Sun Tree while I'm here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Still keeps moody gray skies a large portion of the day, but overall the city itself seems to have sprung into life over the past year or so. The Sun Tree is beautiful. It's still a vastly bark-visible tree. It has that orange-brown color across it, smooth in most places, a little more textured toward the bottom, but you see the very lush green leaves up into the boughs. You can see little bits of white flowers that year-round reside up in the top. It stands there before you in all of its magnificence.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I come up and say, hey, Sun Tree. Casting Speak With Plants, of course.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hey, Keyleth."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's been a while."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's been so long. You're looking so good. So healthy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thanks. I've been eating right."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah? Have you been working out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "As much as I can. You know, I'm a tree."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure. Yeah. How's it been? Whitestone seems so much better. Seems happier. Has morale been up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I mean, yeah."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There's kids and stuff."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah? Do the kids sometimes climb in you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you like that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No? Oh, right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, it's uncomfortable."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Should I put a Do Not Climb sign on you? Would you like that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Would you have to nail it into me?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No. I could stake it in the ground around you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's fine."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But thank you. I appreciate the offer."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Anything to make you more comfortable, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Appreciate it."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You're great."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, thanks. Anyway, is there anything else that you need? Any new news? Anything going on?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Nah. Glad the snowing stopped."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right? Thought that winter would last forever, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's hard to keep these blossoms up through the winter, let me tell you."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, yeah? But you're still good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah. How are you doing, Kiki?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, you know. Keeping busy, keeping on keeping on, you know? It's been good. You're like the coolest person I know, and you're a tree. It's weird. Even after a year, it's like talking to an old friend. It's good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If I could blush." (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh wow.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, look! Some of these flowers are getting a little pink, Sun Tree.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hi."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's gone on for a little long.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm glad you brought that up. I didn't want to breach the subject."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just wanted to make sure you were cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, I'm cool."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bye.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hang up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's going to be a while before you guys call again.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's the rule. Long time.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know what they're looking at.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't know, either. Partway into the day, we'll say that you've been doing this. The bakery's been going fine. Which, actually, Pike and Vex, you've been in the process of-- have you guys hired employees to run the bakery?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Obviously.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you more playing as managers as opposed to actual workers?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Owners.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Creative input.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike, on this day, you've been keeping tabs on this. A couple of the Pale Guard approach the bakery. One of them, without seeing you, walks in and goes, "We're looking for Pike. Is Miss Pike in?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Could you please come with us? There's somebody on the border requesting your presence."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Where?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "On the outskirts of Whitestone."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Someone who says they know you. You'd better come with us."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The two guards step back and-- do you walk with them?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are any of us with you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's just her, at the moment.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does she walk past the Sun Tree when I'm having a random conversation with no one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Straight perception? 30.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you're walking away from the Sun Tree and begin heading back to the northern side of Whitestone, glancing back at him. "Oh, it's good to talk to him again." And you see Pike walking with two guards just on the southwestern side of the square. She looks a little nervous.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's about that time I'm like, okay, bye, Sun Tree. And then I'm going to Beast Shape into a crow and start circling her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are two kids off to the side that were just playing who look over and go, "Whoa."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was amazing!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That was awesome!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I want to do that!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Poop on the way up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was even cooler!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see a male gnome with short dark hair, slicked to one side, and a well-groomed mustache that curls at the end. He's in the middle of talking when he glances over and sees you and goes, "Aha! "She's here!" He leaps off the top and the guards get defensive as he goes, "Astra! Ogden! JB? She's here!" Then he goes rushing off in your direction as the guards are like, "Sir! Sir!" He ignores them for a second, and the two guards with you say, "Miss Pike, should we?" And they go for their blades.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A little ragged at the edges, but fine. Big, swishy pants and boots, and he lifts you up for a second and then sets you back down and is like, "It's been quite a while."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's been so long. How did you know where to find me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is JB Trickfoot. She is the--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: JB?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We've heard all about you. I've been so proud to hear that you've done such great good in the "world, cousin."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's been a very long time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Far too long."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Did you guys just come here to see me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The old one now catches up, and you recognize that this is your uncle Ogden Trickfoot, who is the father to both Johann and JB. As he approaches, he has this small walking cane and he's walking at an angle because he doesn't quite see you. He's like, "Are you sure that she's around?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm right here!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Huh?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hi.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Ah. Yes."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How are you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm all right. It's so good to see you."
