lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's so wonderful to see you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There you are."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He adjusts his head a little. "They tell me that you slay dragons!"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes, I did. With my friends.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: My friends?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What did she say?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: My friends!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: JB's like, "She said yes. She's slayed dragons."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I also--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I also have a bakery!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "She says a bakery?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's called the Slayer's Cake!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Between the bursts of facial and head hair, you see a little bit of rosy cheeks poke through with a smile. JB goes, "We'll get you cake. We'll get "you a cake, uncle."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Come this way. I didn't realize you guys would be coming, but I'm glad that you got my letter and everything else.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm Johann's wife. We haven't met, but you are a "sight to see." She takes your hands and pulls your hands and goes, "Oh my, and aren't you the "strapping young lady. Who's the lucky man?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh. Well, no one right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Whatever, I don't know. You can tell me later."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We'll discuss later, maybe, but do come in. I would love to introduce you to some friends of mine. Come into town.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Are these friends Vox Machina?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Miss, do you require assistance?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Just walk us into town. That would be great. Just in case there's anything that might jump out and get us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well." And the three guards that were at the front shout out, "The carriage?" And Johann goes, "Oh, yes! Well, it's now under the watch of one Pike Trickfoot, so just put it "wherever the royal horses go." (chuckles)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I don't like them at all.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A cart of the Sackville-Bagginses just rolled up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Let me-- you know what? Guards, can you take them to the Slayer's Cake? And I will be right there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course! You're a busy woman. Don't worry about it." Astra fluffs her hair a bit. "Besides, I can have a guard escort me any day." The guard just grabs her arm and starts walking along with her. You can already tell she's a bubbly flirt.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Keyleth flies down and lands on Pike's shoulder.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Some of my family is here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (gasps, running noises)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hold on! Watch your pockets, watch your stuff. Just keep an eye on your things. Yeah, just please come?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We've got you, darling.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I bamf out of my Beast Shape. Whoa! What?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, I sent money. I didn't tell them where I was.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You sent money?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I did. I don't know, maybe I shouldn't have done it. I just wanted to make sure that they were okay. Maybe that wasn't a good idea.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You've told us very vague amounts about your family.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Because they're--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It was surprising. You haven't talked about them too much, just that they're shady.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I left when I was very young, so a lot of them I don't really know. Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know, we love you, and family or not, if anyone tries to fucking use you, we will--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Thank you. Okay. I don't think it'll come to that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right. I just don't want anyone taking advantage of you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're having this conversation, (thudding sounds)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (shouting) Gnomes! (pants)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Just get ready. Let's go to the Slayer's Cake.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm walking from the cemetery. However far that is.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: They alluded to the fact that they know who Vox Machina is, which I guess in this day and age, people know who we are. Which is weird. Okay, just be prepared, because it's not like I'm embarrassed of my family or anything, I just-- they're great! I just don't really know them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You don't know them?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, Wilhand took me out of there when I was six, so it's been a while.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Have you kept in contact with any of them until recently?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Not really? JB, my cousin who you'll meet in a little bit, but not really. Not really at all.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, they never came by Wilhand's.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, they have so many things to do.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Busy. Important.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: They like to take things, and they're fast and small and that little sleight-of-hand didn't get passed down to me, but-- oh, I'm so uncomfortable right now!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, you're sweating a lot.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Here. And I dab her brow off a little.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Thanks.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you need anything? Do you need anything to look cool?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you want some deodorant? You kind of smell.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I pull out my oils that I use on Vax. Here you go. You're good. Much better.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Have we caught up with them yet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, they've been having this conversation with them just standing in the square not far from the Slayer's Cake.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's never going to get old.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It'll never get old. Yeah, so you've caught up at this point. Percy, you've just started to see them in the distance.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. I'm excited.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Taryon, I don't know if you're--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm at the Slayer's Cake. I am making blondies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So, while you guys are having this conversation, Taryon, you hear what sounds like ruckus, laughter, conversation, voices overlapping, getting louder and louder and then suddenly the front door to the Slayer's Cake, which has been quiet this afternoon, (thud). And then, (laughs) "Oh! This place is amazing! Do you smell that? You smell that, Uncle?" And you watch as the uncle comes in. (sniffs) "Smells like rocks."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Rocks?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Anyway, hi! We're family of Pike Trickfoot, and we were told to come here and try your wares! So this "is a bakery?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: In Gnomish, welcome to the store. Any family of Pike Trickfoot is family of mine. I am one of her closest friends, Taryon Darrington. Here you go. Blondies on the house for everyone to celebrate your blondie, Pike Trickfoot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "She wasn't always blonde, you know."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, I don't know that at all. What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She had dark hair when she was younger.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Astra, free treats!" And they start grabbing and filling their pockets with blondies and eating them in between.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've got more. Sure. You can take all you want. Everything in the store is yours.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as JB walks up with long, dark hair, and goes, "Do you happen to have any water?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Of course! Doty, go fetch some water for these fine gnomes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Tary." Grabs and gets a small bucket of water and sets it down. You watch as JB begins breaking up the pastry and dipping it in the water and then feeding it to the uncle.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ugh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Occasionally has to right his face, and it's getting caught in the beard a little bit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know, family is everything, and I'm so pleased to meet you. Can you tell me what she was like as a child?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, (chuckles) she--" At that point, the door bursts open and the rest of you arrive there at the Slayer's Cake.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, I see you got some blondies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We did. Your friend here--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Taryon Darrington.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Taryon Darrington, who apparently speaks Gnomish-- look at you, keeping your culture. Was "nice enough to give us the run of the house!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I told them they could have anything they wanted in the place, free of charge.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I mean, just don't get sick by having too many pastries.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chuckles) "Oh, my dear. That's not possible."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: This is-- guys? Everybody? This is my family. This is part of my family.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: JB, who is currently feeding the older uncle Ogden Trickfoot, goes, "I'm JB. I'm the cousin who grew "up with her the most. She's my favorite." At which point, she's been so concentrated on this, she doesn't realize she's been mashing the food into the side of Ogden's cheek. (babbling) "I'm sorry." She wipes him down.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm sorry. What brings you fine folk into town? Are you just visiting Pike here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Astra goes, "Well, we travel a lot and we've heard of exploits in various towns all around. I "just have not had the chance to meet Pike after all the stories I've heard, and Johann speaks of "her often, and JB is pretty much obsessed with your exploits." JB's over there. "I've been keeping tabs." "So we were surprised that we were located by a courier who gave us your letter and your "absolutely unnecessary but very appreciated donation to the family, and we thought it would be "nice and right of us to come and thank you in person."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, I'm so glad you did. How in the world did you find out that I was here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's good to see you."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's good to see you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do me next. What have I done?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You're Grog Strongjaw. Yes. You're the one that apparently replaced me."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Huh?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You grew up together once we were not, and you're a strong half-giant of a man. The beard "confuses me, but you've done many great things, I suppose. The rest of you, it is an honor to meet "you. I've heard so much, and it's rare you get to meet heroes in your lifetime." (shouting) "What? I'm still hungry!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They're so nice. I feel terrible.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Are you guys just passing through? Where's your next destination?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Johann pops up and goes, "We're always passing through, my dear, but we figured we'd just "stay for a few days. However long it takes to get to know you a little better, and then we'll be on "our way."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did he say weeks? Did he slip that in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We could stay weeks, if you'd like!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, you know, days might be more--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: As long as you need.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We've been traveling. We're very tired."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pike's family is our family, really.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Agreed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I just want to get a vibe on them. I want to do an insight check and see what I think of them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I assist him on that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Insight you can't-- you have to make an individual insight check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Individuals?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, jeebus. Crap. 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're strange. They're interesting. They're unique. But they seem to be jovial and full of personality. You get a very familiar vibe as you did with Dr. Dranzel's troupe.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Could I request one thing? Could I have a hug?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, all of you at once!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A bunch of kittens on a man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They look at each other. Johann, and then Astra rushes in. They both give you a hug, and then Astra goes, "Uncle Ogden!" She grabs Ogden and (yelps) comes over and, "I'm confused." He's being held against you, really, and you watch as JB approaches and pats you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: JB? Can I talk to you for just a minute?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Just step outside on the outdoor bench.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She follows you out there. "You look so pretty."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You've done so many good things. I've heard so many good things. It's so good to see you."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's very good to see you. How have you been?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, I've been watching Ogden. Traveling and seeing the sights of the countrysides of "Tal'Dorei. It's life on the road."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I know. I understand that. How are my parents?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She looks around and goes, "Well, we haven't heard from your immediate side of the family since "your bastard father left for Wynandia across the sea. Good riddance. No offense."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No. None taken.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You're not missing much with them."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I insight check her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh no. 13?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13? She seems guarded and hard to read, but legit.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Well. Have you guys, in your travels-- you know who Scanlan Shorthalt is, I'm sure?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She lights up and goes, "Yes, I've heard of him. Is he around?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He's not around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh. Okay, but I've heard of him. I've heard of his exploits. (chuckles) As I've asked around, "he's left quite a trail of ladies through the years."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He definitely has.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They have a lot to say about him."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Bit of a scoundrel, that one."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Such a scoundrel.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It makes me so uncomfortable.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All right, well, let's go back inside.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course. I'm glad we had this bonding time."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Me, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You want to come, right?" She grabs your arms and tugs a little bit. You get a very faint sense of mild arrested development that makes you a little uncomfortable.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She walks inside with you with her arm on your shoulder, and as you come back inside, the hug seems to have pulled away from Grog for a second, but the laughter is billowing from the room, and Johann, at this point, is mid-story to Grog. "And that's the craziest thing! She was so "small, but could yet poop so much."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I love it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's incredible!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's my favorite kind of people. Big pooper!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If we could have painted a picture, you wouldn't know where she put it away! But that's "another story."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, well, we don't need to keep saying these things. You know, if you guys would like to stay just for a few days, because we're going to be leaving.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, we're not. We're here for a long time.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We have a lot of stuff to do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trip coming up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course! Days. Weeks was invited here, of course, but--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She doesn't actually live here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Passing through. Traveling on.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think we have a thing that we have to go fight, and we have so many things that we have to do.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're settling here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (groans)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We have some things planned.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Astra steps forward and takes your hand and she goes, "It's all right, dear. We're not going "to stay longer to make it uncomfortable. I'm sorry about these folks."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I married into the Trickfoots. I'm not bound to the same ridiculousness as these guys, so "don't worry."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I insight check that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't trust your "married in this bullshit" shit. 20, total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20 total?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I bet she's at the helm!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Happy new year, everybody.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't like her winking at Percy!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: While we're whispering about things--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have a great new shirt in the store. It says Vox Machina.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (silly accent) If you could get a close-up, you would see all of the Vox Machina's made of a different weapon that Vox Machina uses.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was amazing.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, why don't you guys stay in my place, and I'll take care of you guys while you're here? Just explore the town, and when we're getting ready to go, I'll let you know, and you guys can go on your merry way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That sounds fantastic."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's so happy to have the Trickfoots together again."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's just so great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So where are we all staying?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, you can stay at my place.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Fantastic! Wondrous. Show us along! We have things to unload."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you want to grab any of the last bit of pastries for the day? Obviously, free treats today.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, but don't fill up, because I assume we're all going to have dinner tonight together, right?

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, let's have dinner.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Wonderful. I love it. I love it!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: After that, no free treats.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're saying this, Uncle Ogden has stepped forward again and JB is like, "Uncle Ogden?" He (grunts) and reaches out and finds the edge of your cheek and chin and he drops his cane, pulls his glasses off, and you see these tiny, dark beady eyes between the wrinkles and he goes, "Pike."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hi.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's so good to see you."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's so good to see you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you. You're a good one." He puts his glasses back on and reaches out, and JB picks up a stick and hands it to him. He's like, "Thank you."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Thank you, Uncle Ogden.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it look like he really needs that cane?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, go for it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you need this? Boom!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think it looks like he really needs it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I do. I feel really terrible.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: His head spins for a second. He smiles, and in Gnomish back to you, he says, "Oh. It's been a while."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I love him.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, should we get some dinner? Are you guys hungry, or have you filled up on pastries?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh!" You watch as Johann spits out the pastry. "Always hungry!"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, great. Well, let's have a delicious dinner.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We could always go hunting for our dinner. Classic way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's how we do it here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Is that how you got your pastries?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pastries you pay for.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: For the meat pies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, we're not hunters, so I guess we'll stay here until you finish hunting. You know we're "not hunters. We've never been hunters. Trickfoots don't hunt."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We can-- (sighs).

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's go freshen up for dinner.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We'll go freshen up for dinner.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Not a bad idea. I could use a bath, actually. How about you, Astra?" Astra's like, "Oh, I'd love a bath right now. I've been on the road for so long." And JB goes, "Uncle could really use a bath."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Uncle could use a bath, I know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He could. He smells like cheese.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All right. I'll walk you guys. Let's walk to my place.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well. Show us along!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to whisper to you as we walk back to the house: don't give them any more free things, all right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What? I thought they were Pike's people.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, they're great. They're wonderful, but no more free stuff. Just today, but no more after that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Of course. I'm sorry if I was out of line.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course not. You're so generous.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I love you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I love you so much.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm hooking Kiki by the arm. Hey, you've got that look in your eye.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just don't like it when people try to take advantage of my friends, but they're family, and if anyone is in need, I don't want to potentially put them out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But you think they're a little bit hinky? That's a yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We can just keep an eye out. I'm protective.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Pike, if you need anything, just let me know. And I completely understand the awkward position you're currently being put in.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh god, it's so awkward! I just don't know. Thank you, Percy. I'll let you know if there's anything that I need.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Keep an eye on the odd one.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Which one? Because they're all odd.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's not a good thing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I say to Vax: Just keep an eye on the odd one, all right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: See if you notice an interest.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pike, are there any more coming?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If you notice an interest in that one, please let me know. Maybe I could figure out what she's interested in and show her around, maybe.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. That's a great idea. So this is all of you, then, that came? You guys have been traveling around, just yourselves?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Got any more of you coming?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Not coming with us. The Trickfoots tend to scatter on their own."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like bunnies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah, sure. We'll go with that one. Yeah, not everyone can be trusted in the family."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's frustrating. The people that you care for and spend your life hitting behind betray that "trust, and good riddance to them."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh. Well, is there anything you would like to see while you're here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They all look back at JB, who lights up again and goes, "Everything."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Well, is there anyone in particular you would like to give you a tour?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see a moment of heartbreak and JB goes, "Very well."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Mr. Strongjaw, you may show us around."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. You won't regret that choice.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All right, come with me. You can come to my place, freshen up before dinner, and we'll have a great time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Great! Great. Now, to the baths. How big are your baths? Are they huge? Are they "human-sized baths? Are they bigger than human-sized baths?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You!" All right, so you show them up to the castle, which I assume is where you're letting them stay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're staying in the castle?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Unless anyone's doing something terrible, or going somewhere they really shouldn't.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. Okay. That information is easily distributed throughout the Pale Guard, without issue.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "I guess that silverware wasn't so important."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, we're bringing out the moderate silverware.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's a good idea. That's a great idea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All the good silver is hidden. Hidden up high.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because there are only within the castle at any given time, four baths. Four rooms that contain full baths. Occasionally, you have to wait for a person, but they immediately scatter. Three of them are taken.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. We might have to wait a little bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You wait a while. Eventually, they one by one start making their way down to the main banquet hall of the castle. Cleaned up. You watch as Johann comes down, wearing his same clothing that appears to have been cleaned. "Wow! I'm appreciative that you have servants here that can "do such a nice job with such fine family threads." His mustache is done perfectly. His hair is still slick and wet from the bath, combed over. "Well, thank you. It's in the blood."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (chuckles) It sure is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He turns around. "Astra? What's taking her so long?" Walks back out to the stairway and rushes past the guards, his little gnomish head dodging by their knees, almost. He goes, (shouting) "Astra!" You hear a voice go, (shouting) "I'm almost done! Wait and be patient!" He goes back. "She'll be down in a moment. Don't worry. In the meantime, "is there an appetizer course?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Sure. Why don't you take a seat, and order whatever you want, on me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: ooh, what vintage have you?" He begins talking with the servants about what various wines are available.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm just going to pop into the kitchen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And tell the staff in the kitchen: obviously, you can make whatever you want. I'm just hoping maybe you don't make it too tasty tonight. Nothing too extravagant. You know, nice, but average. Right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The servants that are there, the whole waitstaff and kitchen staff go, "Of course, milady."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nothing great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "A curious request, but one we will fulfill to our greatest ability."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you so much. Lots of salad, lots of very dry, hard meat. Turnips. Lots of turnips.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Heavy food.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, family's here tonight, so everything has to be on its best, all right? The best stuff we have in this kitchen. These are Trickfoots. We have to treat them right, and we have to treat them well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The staff stops and goes, "Friend Taryon, I'm sorry, but the lady requested specifically "that the meal not be--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What lady?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Lady Vex'ahlia."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They need to be treated--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He goes, "I am sorry, but--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who's your manager?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The lady you're speaking about."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, you're right. She is your manager.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tary, you have Luck!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Back to the pool house with you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I do have Luck.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (groans) No!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What am I doing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Persuasion.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's 24.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He goes, "But if you say it's the word of Lady Vex'ahlia--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: These are Trickfoots, man. Trickfoots! Treat them as you would your own mother.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm so confused. We'll do our best. Holy shit." You see this internal struggle. "Everyone! Fine "meat's back on the menu. Sorry." And the staff goes, (groans) and starts throwing shit out that they were halfway working on and starting from scratch.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I go out and grab Vex. Little EG, what are you doing? You told them to give them bad food tonight? These are Trickfoots! We have to treat them with honor and respect.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tary! Ugh.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You said what?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, look. All right. If your father came, and you dislike him very much, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I would give him the best.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit. Okay, bad comparison. These people suck. They're mean--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What are you talking about? They've been nothing but nice. They've showered her with kisses and affection. It's affection that I've never even seen in a family before!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tary, dear. Darling. They don't treat her very well, and they'll use her, and they'll stay here and keep taking advantage of her, and we don't want that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But I get to practice my Gnome.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, that's true. You can practice as much as you want over the next couple of days, but we don't want to impress them. The more they like it, the longer they'll stay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Best to feed them well, at least.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll back off.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Continue to be charming.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Always.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "Those are all the foods I know."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Chop chop!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Throw out what they were finishing and begin to make eggs, getting the cheese ready, and all the hearty pork meats. And the peanut butter.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a Charlie Brown Thanksgiving.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Spaghetti-Os.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Popcorn.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Just great. I run over to Percy really quickly. (whispering) Percy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I just wanted to... apologize in advance for whatever may happen in the next few days.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm so excited for the calamity that's about to be brought down upon my house.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There is nothing, short of full dragon apocalypse at this point, that could faze us. We can live through this. We'll be fine.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I come up and I give her a hug from behind and say: We will never judge you for your blood, dear.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Again, I'm not embarrassed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course not. They're great. They seem wonderful.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah. Yeah, they do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: To be fair, I've also already started drinking.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh great. Okay, I'll join you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I pull out the flask of Courage that I've brought.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Flask of Courage?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You got more Courage?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, there's a lot of Courage. We make it every year.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I take a big gulp. All the gulps.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It burns. It burns so good.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (grunts)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It burns a lot.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It does.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're going to get drunk, but you're not going to get sleepy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's going to feel good in this area.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You won't get sleepy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's do this.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Let's go eat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys all find yourselves ready, the Trickfoots also begin to fill in to the banquet hall. The servants provide a fantastic spread of heartily cooked pork meats, peanut butter fresh from the jar, piles of cheeses.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought you asked--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is not what I asked for.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: This is comfort food in Whitestone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We thought we would give you the cornucopia of our experience.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I take a big spoon of peanut butter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eventually the spoon finds its way there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, that's the next 30 minutes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As this is happening, Johann begins asking questions. "So! This is your castle?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Is this my castle?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: JB is like, "No, it's not her castle. It's his castle. She's just staying here, for now."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Technically, it's my sister's castle, but certainly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point, Cassandra comes in from the back, arms crossed. She wanders in. "Brother?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's code. Yes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Everything all right, brother?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well, I'll be in my chambers if you require anything."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're sure you don't want to join us, Cass?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm fine. I'm a bit tired. It's been a long night. But whoever you are, welcome to "Whitestone." She looks back to Percival.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The Trickfoot clan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Ah."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And Keyleth goes-- ASHLEY If she looks over at me, I'm going--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I would love to welcome you all to Whitestone. You are guests of ours if you are "guests of hers. We'll talk later."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Absolutely.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She makes her way back up the stairs. You watch as Trish, who's her bodyguard on this shift, follows her up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's still here? Trish.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Trish the Dish.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Trish the Dish.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's one of two shift personal guards of Cassandra.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to sit next to Ogden.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: JB, I can feed him for a little bit if you'd like to look around or something, or talk to anybody here? Who do you really want to talk to?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You. We have so much to catch up on. It's been a long time."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Is there someone in Vox Machina that you really love?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She looks around. There's this long, awkward pause as she keeps looking over Vox Machina again and again, but not making any eye contact with Grog, and eventually goes, "I suppose Lady Vex'ahlia." Hands the spoon over to you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Well, I'm sure she would love to talk to you. She's very inviting, very friendly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Should I just go sit?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay." She gets up from the table. Johann's still talking. He's telling stories. "We "Trickfoots. For generations, we've been problem-solvers. We rove from place to place, "solving problems across the countrysides. If you have a squeaky wheel, we fix the wheel. If you "have a squeaky door, we fix the door."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Amazing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you have a squeaky tax man, we fix the tax man. That's a joke! That's a joke. You can "laugh. See, there you are."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They kill the tax man.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Everybody hates taxes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As this conversation's happening, there's a small bowl of what looks to be some of the pork, but it's been soaked in some water or wine, and it's been mashed or pre-chewed. You're not quite sure. But you have the spoon there, and you have Uncle Ogden sitting there going--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I start speaking to him in Underdark because I haven't spoken that in a while. Ogden? How are you liking traveling with everybody? With Johann and Astra and JB?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: His ear perks up a little bit and he goes, "I haven't heard that talk in a long time." His head turns slightly towards you, but he's still looking off a little bit from under the glasses.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is this Undercommon?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Underdark.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Underdark?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It would be considered Undercommon.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's Undercommon? Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm listening.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm reading their lips.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They take care of me. We're here now." His hand reaches over and grabs your hand and holds it for a second. He goes, "We're here now to protect you."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Protect me from what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "From the curse."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What do you mean?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I've been having visions of you. An angel of light swallowed by dark."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Are these just dreams?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I take a spoon of peanut butter. It's a little bit easier. Here you go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Like Mr. Ed.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It dribbles out a little bit. "Unexpected."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Sorry, the mix between the pork and peanut butter. It's an interesting mix, but it's Grog's favorite.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's good."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's a good mix!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see him smiling now.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can you tell me about Astra? How did she come into the picture?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Astra met Johann about ten years ago. He needed someone to nail him down. Spry, wily, prone "to terrible choices. He's a stupid boy. Stupid, stupid boy." At which point, Johann, who's been talking, stops and goes, in Undercommon, "I can hear you, Dad. Anyway!" "She's good to him. If she breaks his heart, I'll kill her."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: There you go. And any word from my family? My mother, anything? It's been a long time since I talked to them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They absconded east and got in a little trouble."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That makes sense.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's just like my brother to do that. He's the one who held "the stupid gene on our generation."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm tired now."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Uncle Ogden, are you tired?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I can have someone take him, if you'd like to stay?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "He's very fragile. If you'd trust anyone to take him?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can do it, dear.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well. Yeah. You would like to stay with him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's what I'm used to, but if Lady Vex'ahlia--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I would love to. I think your cousin wants to speak with you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point, as soon as you say that, she smiles brightly and goes, "Actually, yes."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Be on your guard, dear.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, I will. Check your pockets.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Always.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We just thought he was an old coot."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, he's all I've known and he's wonderful. He's my family, since I left, and I'm sorry I haven't really contacted you guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's all right. We make ourselves scarce on purpose."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah. Well, so you've been taking care of Ogden?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We've been helping out, but mostly me, yeah."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Has he told you anything that he dreams about?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see that she stiffens up a little bit. "So he's already told you."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't want to ruin an evening that's going so well, but he's had visions. I'm worried "about you. When we got your letter that-- we didn't know how to find you. We didn't think that "you were in the area. When your letter found us, we thought maybe you weren't that far away, so we "began to search our way along the Silver Cut."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Can I insight check her again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, go for it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I can't figure out what's going on. Ugh, balls. Oh, wait. 16?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's hard to read, in general. Even when she was a kid, she was an odd duck. She seems genuine.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Well, how's everybody feeling? Are you tired? Are you full? Is it bedtime? What's going on?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I could talk to these people all night long.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But if we should turn in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see Astra, who's been drinking deep of one of the two fine bottles of red wine, is drunkenly leaning with her arm around Johann's arm. He's a little tipsy, but he's still in conversation, talking to Grog. He's telling embarrassing story after embarrassing story, and since you're so eager and no one else really wants to pay him as much mind. He's talking to the table, but he's mainly focusing on you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you begin helping Ogden, who, as you grab his arm, he's shaking, and he has his cane as he moves along. His skin is very loose.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ogden, would you like me to help carry you, or are you all right to walk?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I can walk under my own power."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course you can. Feel free to lean on me, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "At the stairs."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's still looking off. As soon as you get to the stairs, he gets about two steps and has to stop and breathe, and another two stairs.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I put my arm down so he can put as much weight as he wants.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He leans into it and you eventually help him up the staircase that spirals up to the second floor and eventually lead him to his chambers.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, and I start talking to him on the way to his room in Undercommon. And ask him: How long have you guys been on the road?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Always."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Always?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "By nature, we don't really put down roots." Big old smile as he says roots, darkened, some broken teeth. Heinous smell.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Peanut butter and pork.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I couldn't help but overhear you talking to Pike about dreams you've been having.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes. Dreams."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What kind of dreams?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Terrible premonitions."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, he stops and looks up towards you as you're holding his arm, and he reaches up and pulls the glasses shakily from the front of his face and through his small dark brown beady eyes, you see the whites at the sides are bloodshot. He glances up and goes, "The kinds of dreams that end a bloodline."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, that sounds terrible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We're trying to find a way to stop it."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, that's good. I would like to stop it, as well. We all love Pike very much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good. Then we came at the right time."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I insight check him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was almost. 21? 21.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whispers!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So, Taliesin, what's the V? What's the V on this shirt?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The V on this shirt?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a book.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That looks to be a tome of some sort.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who is represented by a book?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The whole top row is reserved for Matthew.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, okay. And what's the M in Machina?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It appears to be some sort of very naturalistic bow and arrow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who would that correspond to?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Scanlan, I imagine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, yeah. That makes sense. And the A?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The A appears to be a bird's mask and a pistol.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Also Scanlan.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Also Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, sure. And the C?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The C is some sort of natural wooden crest of some kind.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's Grog taint.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: In fact, this is entirely Grog and Scanlan, which I think, it's about time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, Ogden. Are you all right getting into your bed? Do you need any help with that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you can get me to the edge of it, I can manage."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, of course. I hope you know that we're here for you, with whatever you need, as long as we're all here to help Pike. We love her like family, as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good. She can use some family."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. Dark tidings.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Dark tidings, indeed."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are we talking like falling into a pit or are we talking like-- I'm going to walk him to the bed and maybe like--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (raspy grunt) He gets up and leans the stick off to the side, and it (thudding noise) onto the ground.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll crouch down and start untying his little boots.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's all right. I can get that."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't mind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He leans back and lets you do it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What kind of dark things are we talking?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There's a legend in the Trickfoots. Every generation, one is born with the blood curse. One "that carries with it the anger of someone slighted when we first became Trickfoots. Maybe it's "superstition, but every one of these individuals died a horrible, painful death, screaming of a "shadow that came for them. It's a myth, I know, but these dreams are real, and I'd rather be "careful and wrong than careless and right."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you see the shadow in your dreams?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Shapeless. Dark. Eyes like burning coals."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does that sound like the smoke demon that we saw come out of Percy? Anything like that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Shapeless, black shadow with red eyes sounds similar, but Orthax was generally black smoke. Had form, and the eyes were more of a yellow.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The John Doe of demons, really.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right. How long have you been having these dreams?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Months."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Have you ever witnessed it happen before? Have you had the dreams about anyone else?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Only once. I was very young."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And they died.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "My brother."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Theobold.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And do you know who it is the Trickfoots slighted in this myth?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Anyway."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Random question. Do we see an obvious family resemblance with Pike and any of them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you've been paying attention to them most of dinner. Mannerisms, everything. There are some similarities.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Facial features, I mean.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. They're not direct family. They're cousins, uncle-- they're once removed from her central nuclear family. But you do see similarities in cheekbone structure, at least with Johann, Ogden, and JB. Moreso with JB. It's hard with the mustache with Johann. But there are some similarities between JB and Pike, and you can't help but envision these two cute little gnome children playing together. These two dark-haired female gnomes running around, and there may have been an age when they could have been hard to tell apart from each other.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Swapped at birth?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Freaky Friday!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh man. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As Johann picks up Astra. "Anyway, it's been a fantastic meal. I appreciate your hospitality, "and I look forward to this grand tour you promised tomorrow."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, yeah. Anything you want to see, as long as you've got more of those stories.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, I've got loads."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to sneak next to JB really quickly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If you want a more proper and private tour of the city, consider the offer open. Just think about where you'd want to start. The offer does stand, though. Have a good evening.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you say this to her, she glances back and says, "Very well. Under the needs of being "upfront, as well, I want you to know that I'm not interested." (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you. That's what it totally sounded like.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It did sound like you were fucking flirting.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You want a proper tour of deez nuts? (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't think he's figured out what she's talking about.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't think he has, either, no.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Very well, then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm not interested."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: In the tour?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "In the tour, yes."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Smooth as butter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She gets up and walks away. "Good night, everyone. Good night, Pike."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How did she do that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eventually, all the gnomes have left and you're all there, dumbfounded, at the dinner table.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I come back down.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Check your pockets! Check your pockets.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I had no valuables on me at all.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have everything that I own on me. Am I missing anything?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I check my hair to make sure my brooch is still in it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I check my pouch and make sure my antlers are still there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everything's in place.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think they're lovely.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Regardless of the people, it's still fun seeing you being bested.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Cheap shot, at best.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You are very different from them.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They are quirky.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, you're quirky.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, but I mean, I haven't seen them in a very long time. Since I was but a kid.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Why did Pom-Pom take you out of there?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, because he was different and had a different life plan and because he became a cleric and was the first of-- I don't know how far back. I don't even know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And older than all of them.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah. And he saw that I was and decided-- we left. He took me when I was little, and we left. There was a lot that happened, but I didn't know where they were because they travel.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They just got here, but what's your feel on this?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't know. I heard some things with some discussions I had tonight, and I need to figure out if they're true or not. We'll figure out in the next few days, just to see what's going on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This dream that the old one talked about, does that worry you?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How do you know about that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You don't know that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He does. He was listening in.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, that's right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I actually talked to him a little bit about that, as well.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You did?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A dream? What dream?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What did he say?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It was his brother who passed away a long time ago.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes, this is a thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Have you heard about this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You haven't because you haven't been with most of the Trickfoots for most of your life.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've been with Wilhand since you were very young. You said six. He's not been eager to talk about the family. You can see he resents the Trickfoot clan, so you haven't heard of this, but you also know very little about them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wilhand never discussed it with you?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No premonitions of a curse from Wilhand?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He didn't talk about the family. He wanted to be separate from them and he didn't want me to be influenced by them at all.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hang on. I don't mean to question everything, but Wilhand defected from the whole family and became a cleric, but he never mentioned anything of a curse? Why did he become a cleric?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I see your reasoning.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That seems like a dichotomy there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It actually makes perfect sense to me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He likes helping people.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or he's terrified of some superstitious curse. Maybe both?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Maybe both.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We trust you, and Wilhand raised you, so Wilhand must have his head screwed on straight.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to say you're in a room of people who were raised by-- at least 60 percent of the time, ridiculous people who have their head screwed on straight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's accurate.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe we should ask him about it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's where I was going. Is there any merit in trying to get a hold of Wilhand right now, while they're here?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can we, from here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's in Westruun right now. It is also late in the evening.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can get us anywhere very quickly.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Tomorrow we should go visit him?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. I don't think they're going to burn down the castle.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe while they're taking a tour, we bamf to Westruun for just a minute.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't necessarily know if-- do you want to bamf, or do you just want to talk? We can probably just talk to him, or maybe we could have him sent for.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you remember our conversations with Wilhand when we were in Westruun?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They were a little squirrely.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm a little worried about leaving them here unattended.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Some of us can stay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think it would be a half-and-half situation.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Split the party!

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Split the party!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We could. As you guys know, Wilhand is a little-- he's in his older years.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll try to keep it quick.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: But we could try to keep it quick.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: In and out, ask him a few questions.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And Wilhand is the brother of Ogden?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, he's older than that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, Wilhand is older than Ogden.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wilhand's older than Ogden?!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wilhand's older than Ogden.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I thought Ogden was as old as life itself!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, Ogden did a lot of drugs when he was younger.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ogden's had a hard life.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's got to be at least 150 or 200 years old.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ogden looks like he's older, but his physicality is not based on age as much as it's based on--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He had a Mick Jagger lifestyle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Something akin to that, I guess you'd say.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or at least a Tom Waits one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Let's circle back tomorrow.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And while they're doing the tour, maybe we can pop over real quick and I think that would be better than him seeing them here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Even as an outsider, that seems a little ugh.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Grog, you'll take the loud ones tomorrow and I'll take the quiet ones?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait, what? I thought I get them all.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you want to get them all?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, don't they want all to be on my tour?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe you could do the tour together?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe you could do a Grog tour and then a Percy tour.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Or you could assist Grog.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Because you asked so nicely. Also, I was thinking the carpet might be a fine way of moving them around the city.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! That is actually a wonderful idea.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: They would be pretty fascinated by that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Quite distracted.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know, the Grand Poobah needs an assistant.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh. Perhaps.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's only befitting of your station that Percival aid you in such a fashion.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes. Quite.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The two masters of the city. Of course.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: My history of the city is unrivaled.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I will definitely agree that there are sections of this city I would absolutely agree that you are the master of, at this point.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (sighs) It's going to be a lot of brothels and bars.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "And this was my first hook-up, and this was the scene of my second hook-up."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. This is a big tree.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm excited for this.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am so excited for this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, as you all eventually find yourselves resting for the evening, contemplating the plans to take first thing in the morning, we'll go ahead and close tonight's episode there. We'll pick this up next week.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, you're not going to be here next week?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I will. I'll just be a little late.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sprinting from the airport.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Cool.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll do the tour first, while you guys are off freaking out with the--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bamfing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll stall if we need to. We'll make it happen. All righty, guys. Well, thank you so much for watching tonight. I hope you enjoyed it as much as we did.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're all a year older now!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my gosh.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're older!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Grog is 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll be back here next Thursday, 7PM Pacific, as usual. Until then, have a wonderful weekend and is it Thursday yet? Good night, guys.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Go buy t-shirts! [music]
